infos.fullDescription:
[Français] 
Le Café Mammouth est une instance suisse de Mastodon tournant sur un serveur français et ouverte au monde. En particulier, nous accueillons volontiers les artistes, les illustratrices et les illustrateurs, les journalistes, les auteures et les auteurs, les bibliothécaires et les archivistes, les scientifiques, les ingénieures et les ingénieurs, les enseignantes et les enseignants, ainsi que tous les esprits curieux.

[Italiano] 
Il Mammouth Caffè è un'istanza svizzera di Mastodon installata su un server francese e aperta al mondo. Particolarmente benvenute e benvenuti sono artiste e artisti, illustratrici e illustratori, giornaliste e giornalisti, autori, bibliotecarie e bibliotecari, archivisti, scienziate e scienziati, ingegnere e ingegneri, insegnanti, così come tutte le menti curiose.

[English] 
The Mammouth Café is a Swiss Mastodon instance running on a French server and open to the world. We particularly welcome artists and illustrators, journalists and writers, librarians and archivists, scientists and engineers, teachers, as well as all curious minds.
infos.shortDescription:
Amusez-vous. Soyez respectueux. Pas de drame.
Divertiti. Sii rispettoso. Niente drammi.
Have fun. Be respectful. No drama.

instances.info:
[ English | Français | Italiano ]



(Source)


English

Welcome to the Mammouth Café

In the spirit of tilde.club, here are a few, simple rules:


Have fun. Be respectful. No drama.
There is NO GUILT here. NOR SHAME. Not knowing things is fine. Not finishing them is fine too.
We're all trying, and we're all in this together. :)
IMPORTANT NOTE: PLEASE DON'T HACK THE GIBSON.



Guidelines

Aside from the general rules stated above, mammouth.cafe follows principles similar to those of mastodon.social, to wit:


Absolutely no content allowed that would be illegal in Switzerland and/or France.
No discrimination, no racism, no xenophobia, no sexism, no incitement to hate or to violence of any kind.
We take a very dim view of stalking or harassment of other persons, here or elsewhere.

Same goes for encouraging or inciting other people to take part in such activities.
There are CW (Content Warning) and NSFW (Not Safe For Work) options: use them accordingly when you post.
No hard or child/minor pornography of any kind, and keep material of an erotic nature behind CW and/or NSFW filters.
No gore or extremely graphic violence.
No spam, no ads, no affiliate links or excessive promotion.

Of course, you are still welcome to announce your latest comic, self-published novella or upcoming local amateur theatre stage play to our community.
We discourage any sort of corporate accounts: we prefer to keep it personal.

On the other hand, educational institutions, associations and other non-profit organisations (such as e.g. amateur dramatics groups) are warmly welcome.
No fake accounts, even celebrity joke accounts.
We discourage bots, unless they're cute or friendly.
Robots that bang on the server will get bitcanned.
Replicants are like any other machine: they’re either a benefit or a hazard. If they’re a benefit, it’s not our problem.
No zombies allowed under any circumstance.
GNU Terry Pratchett.


Final interpretation and implementation of these rules, guidelines and of general good netiquette, as well as all decisions that may result in account suspension and/or revocation of access, will be up to the administration of mammouth.cafe.


Support

Support is available: ping @support@mammouth.cafe.

For status updates, planned downtimes and so on, you can follow @status@mammouth.cafe.
    
Please remember: this is essentially a one-man show for now, so do not expect an answer within the hour. If it's urgent, try asking the community: someone may be able to lend you a hand.

We'll try not to mess things up, but we probably will at some point. If you feel that what you post here is vital to you, do make a backup somewhere else (atom feeds are available for every account) or, even better, give some of your time and knowledge to help us out with this thing.


Handling abuse and harassment

If you are being abused or harassed, please report the user using the "…" button and then "Report."

If you engage in abusing or harassing behavior, the administration may take any action we deem appropriate, such as an account suspension or revocation of access.

Abuse is anything we say it is. Too bad if you disagree.


Blocked instances

We do block some Mastodon instances where a sizeable part of their community infringes our rules and/or guidelines with their behaviour. We do not usually comment on individual accounts muting, suspension or removal.


Privacy and security

We value your privacy. We are here to have fun, not to make any money by throwing ads down your throat or monetizing the shit out of your online activities. No ads or trackers are installed on this instance.

Please understand however that mammouth.cafe's administrators have potentially access to your data, including your direct messages. The backend is also not encrypted. If this is not all right with you, this might not be the instance you're looking for.

Finally, a word of advice: consider this a public space. Whatever you publish here is public and can (and probably will) be read by someone else or potentially be archived by the Internet Archive and/or other similar insititutions.
    
We'll try to keep things reasonably safe, but if you need to keep your sources confidential or you are involved in activities that may put yourself or others in jeopardy in your country or elsewhere, please take into account the fact that we won't be able to offer you the necessary confidentiality and/or security here.

Also, for truly private data sent between two people, Mastodon offers no end-to-end encryption. Use a dedicated E2E application with good reputation, like e.g. Signal, for the communications you really want to keep private.

And remember to always practice safe hex.


About this instance

This instance is run by Atelier Mammouth in a TARDIS somewhere/time in a big ball of wibbly-wobbly timey-wimey... stuff.

For the time being, costs for running this server are pretty reasonable and the admin can afford them. You should absolutely not feel obliged to pay anything, but if you really wish to support this thing, you can donate something on our Liberapay account. Thank you so much!

But remember: we only accept donations. You don't pay us for this service. Don't act like you do.


And remember: this is FREE software and...


“...if it destroys your computer, rapes your pet, installs Win98 on your toaster and microwave, stops your pacemaker, causes sexual dysfunction, and turns your children into fucked-up trenchcoat-wearing teens carrying guns and worshipping Hitler, don't blame me because I told you it could do that and you went ahead and used it anyway.”

 — James Turinsky



⤴




Français

Bienvenue au Mammouth Café

Dans l'esprit du tilde.club, voici quelques règles simples:


Amusez-vous. Respectez les autres. Pas de drame.
Il n'y a PAS DE FAUTE ici. NI DE HONTE. Ne pas savoir quelque-chose c'est bien. Ne pas finir quelque-chose c'est bien aussi.
Nous faisons de notre mieux, et nous sommes à bord du même bateau. :)
NOTE IMPORTANTE: SVP NE CASSEZ PAS LE GIBSON.



Lignes directrices

Outre les règles générales mentionnées ci-devant, mammouth.cafe suit des principes semblables à ceux de mastodon.social, à savoir:


Nous ne permettons absolument aucun contenu qui serait illégal en Suisse et/ou France.
Pas de discrimination, pas de racisme, pas de xénophobie, pas de sexisme, pas d'incitation à la haine ou à la violence d'aucune sorte.
Nous ne tolérons pas le harcèlement ou l'intimidation d'autres personnes, ici ou ailleurs.

Nous avons la même attitude envers quiconque encouragerait ou inciterait d'autres personnes à procéder de la sorte.
Des options CW (Content Warning = avertissement de sujet sensible) et NSFW (Not Safe For Work = pas adapté à un environnement de travail ou public) vous sont proposées: employez-les à bon escient au moment de publier.
Pas de pornographie dure ou impliquant des mineurs, d'aucune sorte. Veuillez également placer vos contenus de nature érotique derrière des filtres CW et/ou NSFW.
Pas de contenu violent.
Pas de spam, pas de pubs, pas de liens affiliés ou de promotion excessive.

Bien entendu, vous pouvez sans autres annoncer votre dernière BD, votre roman auto-publié ou le prochain spectacle de votre troupe de théâtre amateur locale à notre communauté.
Nous n'encourageons pas les comptes d'entreprise: on préfère garder une touche personnelle.

D'autre part, nous accueillons volontiers les écoles, associations et autres organisations à but non lucratif (telles p.ex. les troupes de théâtre amateur).
Pas de faux comptes personnifiant des célébrités, même dans un but humoristique.
Nous n'encourageons pas les bots, à moins qu'ils ne soient mignons ou attachants.
Les robots qui abusent du serveur seront envoyés à la casse.
Les répliquants sont comme les autres machines: ils sont ou bénéfiques, ou nocifs. S’ils sont bénéfiques, c’est pas notre problème.
Aucun zombie n'est admis, en aucun cas.
GNU Terry Pratchett.


L'interprétation et l'application finales de ces règles, lignes directrices et de ce qui constitue une bonne nétiquette en général, ainsi que toute décision pouvant résulter en la suspension et/ou la suppression d'un compte, est du seul privilège de l'administration de mammouth.cafe.


Support

Vous pouvez contacter notre support en suivant ou contactant ce compte: @support@mammouth.cafe.

Afin d'obtenir des informations sur le statut du serveur, les arrêts planifiés pour des mises à jour, etc., vous pouvez également suivre @status@mammouth.cafe.

Veuillez prendre bonne note que ceci est pour l'instant un spectacle interprété et mis en scène par une seule et même personne. Ne vous attendez donc pas à une réponse dans l'heure qui suit. S'il s'agit d'une urgence, essayez de poser votre question à l'ensemble de la communauté: il se peut que quelqu'un puisse venir à votre aide.

Nous allons tâcher de ne pas gaffer, mais probablement que cela nous arrivera un jour ou l'autre. Si vous considérez ce que vous publiez ici comme absolument vital pour vous, faites-en une sauvegarde ailleurs (des flux atom sont disponibles pour chaque compte) ou, encore mieux, mettez à disposition un peu de votre temps et de vos connaissances pour nous aider avec tout ceci.


Traitement des abus et du harcèlement

Si vous êtes victime d'abus ou de harcèlement, veuillez signaler l'utilisateur à l'aide du bouton "…" puis "Signaler".

Si vous avez un comportement abusif ou harcelant, l'administration peut prendre toute mesure que nous jugeons appropriée, telles une suspension de compte ou une révocation d'accès.

Un abus est tout ce que nous considérons comme tel. Tant pis si vous n'êtes pas d'accord.


Instances bloquées

Nous bloquons certaines instances de Mastodon dans les cas où une partie importante de leur communauté enfreint nos règles et/ou lignes directrices avec son comportement. Nous ne faisons généralement aucun commentaire au sujet des comptes individuels ayant été rendus silencieux, suspendus ou supprimés.


Confidentialité et sécurité

Nous respectons votre vie privée. Nous sommes ici pour nous amuser, pas pour gagner de l'argent sur votre dos en vous faisant avaler des tonnes de pubs indigestes ou en monétisant à longueur de journée vos activités en ligne. Aucune publicité ou traceur n'est installé sur cette instance.

Veuillez toutefois prendre bonne note que les administrateurs de mammouth.cafe ont potentiellement accès à toutes vos données, y compris vos messages directs. Le backend n'est pas chiffré non plus. Si cela ne vous convient pas, ceci n'est peut-être pas l'instance que vous recherchez.

Enfin, un bon conseil: considérez ceci comme étant un espace public. Tout ce que vous publierez ici est public et peut être (et probablement sera) lu par d'autres personnes ou potentiellement être archivé par l'Internet Archive et/ou d'autres insititutions similaires.
    
Nous allons tâcher de maintenir une sécurité raisonnable, mais si vous êtes dans l'obligation d'assurer la confidentialité de vos sources ou que vos activités risquent de  mettre en péril vous-même ou d'autres personnes dans votre pays ou ailleurs, veuillez tenir compte du fait que nous ne pourrons pas vous offrir une confidentialité et/ou sécurité suffisante ici.

En outre, pour des données vraiment privées envoyées entre deux personnes, Mastodon n'offre aucun chiffrement de bout en bout (end-to-end). Utilisez une application E2E dédiée avec une bonne réputation, comme Signal par exemple, pour les communications que vous souhaitez vraiment garder privées.

Et n'oubliez pas de toujours vous protéger lors de toute activité hexuelle.


À propos de cette instance

Cette instance est gérée par l'Atelier Mammouth depuis un TARDIS quelque-part/temps dans une sorte de grande boule de truc-machin tempo-spatio... bidule.

Pour le moment, les coûts liés à ce serveur sont plutôts raisonnables et l'administrateur peut se les permettre. Vous ne devez absolument pas vous sentir obligés à payer quoi que ce soit, mais si vous désirez vraiment soutenir cet effort, vous pouvez faire un don sur notre compte Liberapay. Merci beaucoup!

Mais rappelez-vous: nous n'acceptons que les dons. Vous ne nous payez pas pour ce service. N'agissez pas comme si c'était le cas.


Et rappelez-vous: ceci est un logiciel LIBRE et...


“...s'il détruit votre ordinateur, viole votre chat, installe Win98 sur votre grille-pain et sur votre four à micro-ondes, bloque votre stimulateur cardiaque, vous rend impuissant et transforme vos enfants en de foutus ados portant des vestes en cuir, brandissant des armes et adorant Hitler, ne me blamez pas car je vous avait averti qu'il pourrait faire tout ça, et vous n'avez pas voulu m'écouter et vous l'avez quand-même utilisé.”

 — James Turinsky (traduit de l'anglais)



⤴




Italiano

Benvenuta e benvenuto al Mammouth Café

Nello spirito del tilde.club, ecco alcune regole semplici:


Divertiti. Rispetta le altre e gli altri. Niente drammi.
Qui NON C'È COLPA. NÈ VERGOGNA. Non sapere qualche cosa va benissimo. Non finire qualche cosa va pure benissimo.
Facciamo del nostro meglio, e siamo a bordo della stessa nave. :)
NOTA IMPORTANTE: NON PIRATARE IL GIBSON, GRAZIE.


Linee direttrici

Oltre alle regole generali di qui sopra, mammouth.cafe segue principi simili a quelli di mastodon.social, vale a dire:


Non permettiamo assolutamente nessun contenuto illegale in Svizzera e/o Francia.
Nessuna discriminazione, nessun razzismo, nessuna xenofobia, nessun sessismo, nessun incitamento all'odio o alla violenza di alcun genere.
Non toleriamo molestie o intimidazioni di altre persone, qui o altrove.

Lo stesso vale per l'incorraggiamento o l'incitamento verso altre persone a prendere parte a tali attività.
Ti proponiamo delle opzioni CW (Content Warning = avviso di contenuto sensibile) e NSFW (Not Safe For Work = non adatto ad un ambiente di lavoro o pubblico): utilizzale come si deve al momento di pubblicare.
Nessuna pornografia dura o minorile di alcun tipo. Inoltre, pubblica il tuo materiale di natura erotica dietro filtri CW e/o NSFW.
Nessun contenuto violento.
Nessuno spam (pubblicità non richiesta), nessuna pubblicità, nessun rinvio (link) affiliato o promozione eccessiva.

Naturalmente, se vuoi annunciare il tuo nuovo fumetto, il tuo ultimo romanzo autopubblicato o il prossimo spettacolo della compagnia teatrale amatoriale del tuo quartiere alla nostra communità, non c'è nessun problema.
Scorraggiamo i conti aziendali: preferiamo mantenere un tocco personale.

D'altra parte, accogliamo ben volentieri scuole, associazioni e altre organizzazioni non a scopo di lucro (come ad esempio una compagnia di teatro amatoriale).
Nessun conto fasullo che impersno personaggi famosi, anche se solo a scopo umoristico.
Scorraggiamo i bots, a meno che siano carini o amicali.
I robot che abusano del server verranno rottamati.
I replicanti sono come ogni altra macchina: possono essere un vantaggio o un rischio. Se sono un vantaggio, non sono un problema nostro.
Non sono ammessi zombi, sotto nessuna circostanza.
GNU Terry Pratchett.


L'interpretazione e l'applicazione finali di queste regole, linee direttrici e di ciò che costituisce una buona netichetta in generale, così come ogni decisione che può risultare in una sospensione del conto e/o una revocazione dell'accesso, sono in ultima istanza il privilegio dell'amministrazione di mammouth.cafe.


Supporto

Puoi seguire o contattare @support@mammouth.cafe per il supporto.

Per informazioni sullo stato del server, sospensioni pianificate del servizio, ecc., puoi seguire @status@mammouth.cafe.
    
Prendi buona nota del fatto che questo è per ora uno spettacolo diretto e interpretato da una sola persona. Non attenderti dunque ad una risposta nell'ora che segue. Se la tua domanda è urgente, prova a porrla alla communità: qualcun'altro potrebbe darti una mano.

Cercheremo di non combinare guai, ma probabilmente lo faremo ad un momento o ad un altro. Se credi che ciò che pubblichi qui è di importanza vitale per te, fanne una salvaguardia da qualche altra parte (ci sono dei feed atom a disposizione per ogni conto) o, ancora meglio, offri un po' del tuo tempo e delle tue conoscenze per darci una mano con tutto questo.


Trattamento di abusi e molestie

Se sei vittima di abusi o molestie, segnala l'utente utilizzando il pulsante "…" e poi "Segnalare".

Se hai un comportamento abusivo o offensivo, l'amministrazione può intraprendere qualsiasi azione che riterrà opportuna, come una sospensione del conto o una revoca dell'accesso.

Abuso è ciò che noi consideriamo come tale. Se non sei d'accordo: peccato.


Istanze bloccate

Procediamo al blocco di alcune istanze Mastodon nei casi in cui una parte significativa delle loro communità violi le nostre regole e/o linee direttrici con il loro comportamento. In genere non commentiamo su conti individuali resi silenziosi, sospesi o soppressi.


Privacy e sicurezza

Rispettiamo la tua privacy. Siamo qui per divertirci, non per fare soldi sul tuo gobbo faccendoti inghiottire tonnelate di pubblicità indigeste o monetizzando tutto il giorno (e la notte) le tue attività online. Nessuna pubblicità o tracker sono presenti su questa istanza.

Tuttavia, ricordati che gli amministratori di mammouth.cafe hanno potenzialmente accesso a tutti i tuoi dati, inclusi i tuoi messaggi diretti. Inoltre, il backend non è crittografato. Se questo non ti si addice, questa non è l'istanza che stai cercando.

Infine, un buon consiglio: considera tutto questo come se fosse uno spazio pubblico. Tutto ciò che pubblicherai qui, sarà esposto al pubblico e potrà essere (e probabilmente sarà) letto da altre persone oppure potrà potenzialmente essere archiviato dall'Internet Archive e/o altre istutuzioni affini.

 Cercheremo di mantenere un livello di sicurezza ragionevole, ma se ti trovi in una situazione dove hai l'obbligo di mantenere la riservatezza delle tue fonti oppure nella quale le tue attività rischiano di mettere in pericolo te stesso o altre persone, nel tuo paese o altrove, ti preghiamo di notare che non siamo in grado di offrirti delle condizioni di privacy e/o di sicurezza sufficienti.

Inoltre, per inviare dati in modo veramente privato tra due persone, Mastodon non offre alcuna crittografia da un capo all'altro (end-to-end). Utilizza un'applicazione dedicata E2E con buona reputazione, come Signal per esempio, per le comunicazioni che veramente desideri mantenere private.

E ricordati di sempre proteggerti durante ogni rapporto hexuale.


A proposito di questa istanza

Questa istanza è gestita dall'Atelier Mammouth in un TARDIS da qualche parte/tempo in una specie di grande sfera di roba spazio-tempo... coso.

Per il momento, i costi di questa istanza sono piuttosto ragionevoli e l'amministratore se li può permettere. Non devi assolutamente sentirti obbligato a pagare qualsiasi cosa, ma se veramente vuoi sostenere questo sforzo, puoi fare un dono sul nostro conto Liberapay. Grazie mille!

Ma ricordati: accettiamo solo doni. Non ci paghi per questo servizio. Non agire come se fosse il caso.


E ricordati: questo è un software LIBERO e...


“...se distrugge il tuo computer, violenta il tuo gatto, installa Win98 sul tuo tostapane e sul tuo microonde, blocca il tuo stimolatore cardiaco, ti provoca disfunzioni sessuali e trasforma i tuoi bambini in fottuti adolescenti che indossano capotti e brandiscono armi adulando Hitler, non dare la colpa a me perchè ti avevo detto che poteva fare proprio questo, e tu non hai voluto ascoltarmi e lo hai utilizzato lo stesso.”

 — James Turinsky (tradotto dall'inglese)



⤴

SDF Acceptable Use Policy
Floodgap Terms of Service
GCC, the GNU Compiler Collection prompt
Mastodon Guidelines (thank you @Gargron)
Toot Café Code of Conduct (thank you @nolan)


We trust you have received the usual lecture from the local System Administrator. It usually boils down to these three things:

Respect the privacy of others.
Think before you type.
With great power comes great responsibility.

instances.info:
*Subject to local laws of France where this node is hosted.
 
As of 2015, Amendment 462 guarantees the freedom of artistic dissemination. However, it remains illegal to produce (within French jurisdiction) any sexual depictions of fictional minors under the age of 15. Sharing nazi symbolism is also considered illegal and will be removed from the public timeline accordingly. baraag.net does not produce or manufacture any content, and only freely distributes art that is shared by members of the fediverse.
“We must ensure that art can continue to disturb.” 
- Fleur Pellerin, Minister of Culture and Communication

Registration is open to all, but there is focus on original artists and client/commission work as a theme for this node.

Please refrain from uploading to the local timeline any content that you do not own or have permission to share. Short of anything illegal, feel free to boost whatever you'd like from your federated timeline.

instances.info:
Code of Conduct
>click to read>
This Code of Conduct is adapted from the Contributor Covenant, version 1.4,
available at http://contributor-covenant.org/version/1/4.

Our Pledge

In the interest of fostering an open and welcoming environment, we as
contributors and maintainers pledge to making participation in our project and
our community a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of age, body
size, disability, ethnicity, gender identity and expression, level of experience,
nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, or sexual identity and
orientation.

Our Standards

Examples of behavior that contributes to creating a positive environment
include:


  Using welcoming and inclusive language
  Being respectful of differing viewpoints and experiences
  Gracefully accepting constructive criticism
  Focusing on what is best for the community
  Showing empathy towards other community members


Examples of unacceptable behavior by participants include:


  The use of sexualized language or imagery and unwelcome sexual attention or advances
  Trolling, insulting/derogatory comments, and personal or political attacks
  Public or private harassment
  Publishing others' private information, such as a physical or electronic address, without explicit permission
  Other conduct which could reasonably be considered inappropriate in a professional setting


Our Responsibilities

Project maintainers are responsible for clarifying the standards of acceptable
behavior and are expected to take appropriate and fair corrective action in
response to any instances of unacceptable behavior.

Project maintainers have the right and responsibility to remove, edit, or
reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, and other contributions
that are not aligned to this Code of Conduct, or to ban temporarily or
permanently any contributor for other behaviors that they deem inappropriate,
threatening, offensive, or harmful.

Scope

This Code of Conduct applies both within project spaces and in public spaces
when an individual is representing the project or its community. Examples of
representing a project or community include using an official project e-mail
address, posting via an official social media account, or acting as an appointed
representative at an online or offline event. Representation of a project may be
further defined and clarified by project maintainers.

Enforcement

Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be
reported by contacting the project team at contact@draft.li. All
complaints will be reviewed and investigated and will result in a response that
is deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances. The project team is
obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.
Further details of specific enforcement policies may be posted separately.

Project maintainers who do not follow or enforce the Code of Conduct in good
faith may face temporary or permanent repercussions as determined by other
members of the project's leadership.

Google+からやってきたが誰もおらんインスタンス。botが蔓延っており、LTLの投稿は全てbotによるものだと言われている──



　謎に満ち溢れたおらんインスタンスは、とある一滴の雫から人の手を借りず自然発生的に生み出された。世界は人を作るはずだったが、最初にbotを作り、最後に人を作った。人の人権など皆無で、botの権力が猛威を振るう。人はbotの脅威から恐れ逃げ回っていたが、いつしかbotの手により人間たちは駆逐されていった。

　人間たちは考えた、botに駆逐されない。安寧を手に入れるための術を。人は、自らをbotと虚偽することによって暗闇の中、繁栄する道を選んだのだ。人は、同じ言葉を繰り返し話した。人は、軽く謝った後によく聞こえなかった旨を何度も繰り返し伝えた。こうして、botにbotだと認められた人間たちは、いまでもこの世界に存在しているという──


人間だけがいないインスタンス、おらんSNS。

運営者プロフィール


山下大裕（やました･だいすけ）

1992年6月9日生まれ、24歳。福井県敦賀市出身、東京在住。福井県立敦賀高等学校普通科を経て日本映画大学映画学部映画学科脚本演出コース1期卒業。20歳の冬を迎えた2013年、地元敦賀を舞台にした自主製作映画『SNOWGIRL』(62分)を初監督。その2年後、2015年には敦賀映画第2弾と銘打ちオール敦賀ロケで『弥生の虹』(74分)を監督。18歳の頃から“2020年までに全国公開作を撮る”と公言し『映画で敦賀を盛り上げる』をテーマに日々奮闘中。2017年現在、敦賀市の委託を受け観光ショートムービー『いつか、きらめきたくて。』（全4話）を製作中。


オフィシャルサイト 映画監督山下大裕の2020年全国公開への道

ネタバレの危険があるものは、冒頭に【ネタバレ注意】と入れるか、CWでトゥートをお願いします！

※途中からトゥート内容を隠す方法は「もっと見る」を使って下さい。CWの下の欄が、「もっと見る」を押すと見れるトゥートになります。上段の「警告」欄は、普通にトゥートとして表示されます。



学生は、映画サークルにいた映画マニア。この年になっても、映画は最高の息抜きなので、改めて凄いなぁ…と。映画の無い人生は、考えられない！


いや～映画って本当にいいですよね！それでは映画ドンをお楽しみ下さい。さよなら、さよなら、さよなら！






----------------------------------------------------------------





★重要：登録確認メールが、迷惑メールフォルダに届く場合が多いようです！！特にGmailを使用している方からのご連絡が多いです。ご確認頂ければ幸いです！HTMLメールが受信できないスマホ等では登録できません！



※善は急げ！ということで、急きょ開始致しました！今後の運営方針がまだ確定しておりません。



【利用規約/免責事項/禁止事項について】

★トゥートに内容に関するトラブル等には、管理人は対応致しません。トゥートしたご本人に法的な責任が生じます。発言内容については、十分気を付けてトゥートして下さい。登録のメールアドレスのIPアドレスから個人の特定はできますので、よろしくお願い致します。多くの方が見ておりますので、特定の個人への威圧的なコメントや不快な発言をすることは禁止です。




★アカウント凍結について

特定の方のコメントが不快に思う方は、基本的にはどんどんとミュートやブロックをお願い致します。不快な状況が続いた場合は、そのトゥート内容を通報して下さい。数回以上、同様の通報を受けたアカウントは、こちらでもトゥート内容を確認した上で、事前の予告なく無期限で、サイレンス処理かアカウント停止処分と致します。

サイレンス処を行うと、ローカルTLにはトゥート内容が表示されなくなります。

※フォローしている方のホームTLにはトゥートが表示される可能性がございます。今後、仕様が変更される可能性もあります。

数か月間、不快な内容や過激な発言がなくなっているようでしたら、サイレンス処理を解除する場合もございます。
嫌がらせ行為は、刑事事件となる威力業務妨害等に該当する可能性もありますので、節度のある交流をお願い致します。


また、現実社会でのトラブルや、ネット上のトラブルを当インスタンスに持ち込むことは厳禁といたします。事実の有無をチェックする役割は当インスタンスにはありませんし、そのような時間もございません。特定の個人への批判的なコメントは、事実の有無に関わらず、禁止とさせて頂きます。

このようなトゥートを見かけた場合は、事前通告なくサイレンス処理かアカウント凍結処理を行います。




※自費で運営しておりますので、サーバの処理能力が非常に低スペックです。サーバーに負荷の掛かる行為は禁止させて頂きます。一度に30件以上のCSVフォローリストをインポートすると、処理能力を超えてしまいます。大量のフォローリストのインポート等は絶対にお控え下さい。Pawoo等と比べると数千倍のサーバスペックの差がありますので、ご理解頂ければ幸いです。

※他のインスタンスのアカウントのフォローは原則禁止です。本インスタンスとは関係のないデータが大幅に増えるので、アクセスが遅くなったり、HDDの容量が一杯になってしまうなどの弊害が出る為です。他インスタンスのフォローは、pawoo.netやfriends.nico等のアカウントからお願い致します。

※インスタンステーマと関係のない宣伝目的のアカウントは即時アカウントを削除致します。貧弱サーバなんです。

※捜査機関等からの要請が来た場合は、アドレス等の個人情報を提供する可能性がございます。

※サーバー費用等の負担が結構大きい為、今後運営費を賄う為に、広告等が入る可能性がございます。最終的に毎月ウン十万程度のサーバー費用が掛かる可能性もございます。
ご投稿頂いたトゥートは、多媒体での紹介や人口知能を用いたサービスで利用させて頂く場合がございます。収益が発生した場合は、運営しているインスタンスを継続させる為の費用（サーバー代、運営費等）に充てさせて頂きます。


※退会処理の機能は、現在のマストドンにはございませんので、管理者にご連絡頂いても対応致しかねます。予めご了承下さい。退会に近い処理を行いたい方は、ご自身でトゥートを削除し、フォロワーをブロックし、フォローを外し、パスワードを変え、メールアドレスを捨てアドに変更する等の対応を行って頂く必要がございます。
https://digitalnews365.com/mastodon-3　等WEB上のページをご参照下さい。


※利用規約に変更があった場合はこちらのページにてご報告致します。当インスタンスが別途定める場合を除き、本ページ上に規約を表示した時点より効力が生じるものとします。


※このインスタンスの利用に際し、利用規約の解釈及び適用については、日本の法律に準拠いたします。本規約に関連する一切の紛争は、東京地方裁判所を唯一の合意専属管轄裁判所とさせて頂きます。

instances.info:
Code of Conduct

General
As tooters on this instance, we pledge to uphold an environment that is radically inclusive with respect for all users of the instance.
We are committed to making participation in this instance an oppression-free experience for everyone, regardless of level of experience, gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, or nationality.
We define oppression as any language or action that expresses, reinforces, upholds or sympathizes with any form of systemic social domination.
Examples of unacceptable behavior by participants include:

Personal attacks
Trolling or insulting/derogatory comments
Public or private oppressive language or actions
Other unethical conduct
Users are empowered and responsible for addressing any abuses of the Code of Conduct such that the project remains an oppression-free experience.

Certain types of content should posted in such a way that you avoid showing it to non-consenting parties. These types of content should:

Not be used a profile picture
Be posted with the image content warning (currently "NSFW") tag
Not be posted to the public timeline

the above rules apply to content that is:

Violent
Flashing or rapidly changing


Nudity / Sex / Kink
Nudity / Imagery of sex / Kink act will be abbreviated as NSK

NSK Content Warnings
Nudity is allowed without a CW as long as no genitals or nipples are shown

If they are visible in the image they must be censored
Nipple censoring pertains to any gender

Any sexual imagery must be hidden as a sensitive image

Sexual imagery is considered to be any sex / kink act regardless of clothing state / nudity
Sexual imagery and nudity are distinct concepts
No illegal imagery is allowed regardless of CW state

NSK with a CW do not need to be censored in any way
Violation of the content warning rules will

An immediate silence when its violated on the federation timeline
A domain silence when its violated by multiple parties on an instance
A warning and admin editing your content when its violated by toot.cat users


NSK Consent To Post
NSK should not have other users tagged without their explicit prior consent
Posting NSK that is not of yourself needs to include attribution to the person(s) visible, in such a way that clearly expresses their consent to have that imagery posted
Violation of the consent to post rule will result in

An immediate suspension when its violated on the federation timeline
A domain suspension when its violated by multiple parties on an instance
(1) warning, followed by account deletion when its violated by toot.cat users

toot.cat supports and invites sex workers to join our community and will not tolerate any harassment or slurs made at or about sex workers (ie: prostitute, hooker, whore)

Closing
By adopting this Code of Conduct, users commit themselves to fairly and consistently applying these principles to every aspect of using this instance. users who do not follow or enforce the Code of Conduct may be permanently banned.
This Code of Conduct applies both to toots on toot.cat and to public spaces when an individual is representing toot.cat or its community.
Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be reported by contacting an admin by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and investigated and will result in a response that is deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances. Admins are obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.
instances.name: toot.cat

instances.info:
【ルール・ガイドライン】
当インスタンスは以下のルール・ガイドラインで運用します。随時変更になる可能性があります。


1) マストドンの特徴である「ローカルタイムライン（誰もフォローしていなくても流れてくる参加者のタイムライン）」を大切にしたいため、趣旨にあわないトゥートは各投稿ごとに設定できる「公開範囲（非公開 / ダイレクト）」をうまく利用しましょう。また、IFTTTなど連動投稿設定時には十分配慮してください。BOTは禁止とします。
2) Mastodonの現状は「検索機能が弱い」ため、特定情報の場合は、製品名やブランド名、地名など「関連する」ハッシュタグの挿入を推奨します。ただし、タグだらけにならないよう気をつけましょう。
3) 経験則に基づく情報こそが重要かつ最強！と思っています。ブログやGPSログなどの告知トゥートも歓迎しますが、出典が明記されていてもオリジナルでない写真や、フリー素材を使用したサイト、まとめサイト、パクリサイト、キュレーションメディアのPRは原則禁止とします。
4) ツイッターとは違い、1トゥートで500文字まで入力できます。効率よくトゥートしましょう。
5) いわゆる「バルス」は禁止です。


【一般ルール】

1) 日本の法律は必ず守りましょう。
2) 攻撃的、猥褻的、政治的、宗教的、パクリ、他人が不快に思う投稿はやめましょう。
3) ユーザ間でのトラブルは当事者同士で解決してください。
4) 当インスタンス利用によって損害等が生じた場合も、いかなる補償もいたしません。


【プライバシーについて】

1) 取得したメールアドレスを、第三者と共有したり、売却することはありません。
2) 法律に基づき、司法や警察等の行政機関から法的義務を伴う要請があった場合のみ開示いたします。


【ルール・ガイドライン違反の通報、アカウント停止について】
上記ルール・ガイドラインが守られない場合、予告なく投稿内容の削除、アカウント凍結、またはインスタンスごと運営停止する可能性があります。

違反しているアカウントや投稿を見つけた場合は、管理者にご連絡ください。客観的に対応します。

【管理者について】
気軽なアウトドアと土いじりが好き。サーバ管理実績のある一個人と、商用WEBサイト運用実績がある一個人が私的にボランティアで管理しています。
サーバはさくらインターネットのVPSを使用しています。

【おことわり】
サーバトラブルなどにより事前告知なくメンテナンスを行う場合や、データが消失される可能性は捨て切れませんので、あらかじめご了承ください。

行き届かないところも多々あるかと思いますが、上記ルール・ガイドラインをベースに運用してまいりますので、コミュニケーションリテラシーをお持ちのみなさまのご協力をよろしくお願いいたします。

instances.info:
＝＝＝ お願い＝＝＝


ポッドキャストの配信者やリスナーの利用を想定してますが、話題については特定しませんのでご自由に
情報交換やコミュニケーションを目的としてますので一方的な告知の連投は避けていただければと
安定した運用をめざしますが、データの保存や動作を保証するものではありませんのでご了承ください
安定を求める場合は、他の大きなインスタンスの方が安心かもしれません
限られたリソースで運用しています。Botなどによる大量の投稿やフォローなどはご遠慮ください

良識を持って楽しく使って生きましょう


＝＝＝ 機能について＝＝＝


他のインスタンスの人をリモートフォローしたり、他からリモートフォローすることもできます
他のインスタンスから見られたくない場合は非公開アカウントにしてください
ミュートするとフォローしたまま投稿が見えなくなります
公開、未収載の投稿（トゥート）はマストドンを使っていない人からも見られる公のものです
公開はタイムラインに流れ、未収載はタイムラインに流れません（@通知などに利用）
非公開はインスタンス内のフォロワーだけ見ることができます
ダイレクトは@でメンションをした人だけに公開します（インスタンス 外へのものは要注意）


＝＝＝ 運営＝＝＝

このインスタンスは Whizzo Production が管理・運営しています。

要望やご質問は メールフォーム から。

infos.fullDescription: mastodon.acc.sunet.se is run by the Academic Computer Club at Umeå University located in Umeå, Sweden. ACC is actively involved in several open source projects and we provide mirrors for Debian, Ubuntu, Gnome and GIMP. We also host servers for the Gimpnet, Freenode, and OFTC IRC networks.
infos.shortDescription: Public Mastodon server run by the Academic Computer Club at Umeå University located in Umeå, Sweden. Everyone welcome.

instances.info:
WELCOME TO MASTODON@ACC!

Please read over our general usage policy and code of conduct. We hope you'll be happy here, but if you feel it's too strict, there are many other instances to choose from.


General Usage

Accounts on mastodon.acc.sunet.se are for personal use only; commercial use is not allowed. If you need Mastodon for your business, why not run your own? :)

We ask that you comply with the rules and usage policy of the Academic Computer Club (ACC):
(in English) (i Svenska)

You may not post (or boost/repost):


material illegal under Swedish laws
material against the rules of SUNET
material in breach of the copyright act
material that may damage ACC's public image or its relations with authorities and other institutions

It's the final decision of ACC to judge what material may damage our public relations and take suitable action, which may include removal of the material and suspension of your account.

Code of Conduct

Please remember you're in a public area and what you say here may reach millions of people, many of whom have backgrounds and values that differ from yours; take a moment before posting and think about ways your message may be misunderstood.

You may not use services hosted by ACC to violate another person's integrity. This includes compiling and posting personal information about another person, posting personal communications from a person without their permission, or sending harassing or abusive messages.

Taking part in online interaction obliges the user to comply with the current rules and conventions for computer and net usage (see: netiquette). On Mastodon, this includes using CW and NSFW functions and choosing an appropriate level of public display for your posts.

If you see content which you believe is in breach of these rules, please report it for review.

Reporting an issue

For technical issues, use the administrator contact information listed under "Contact"

For content or abuse issues:


if you're a user on mastodon.acc.sunet.se you can use the "Report Abuse" function on the post you would like to report;
If you're not a user on mastodon.acc.sunet.se, or you're an administrator of another server who would like to discuss an abuse report you received about one of our users, please use the administrator email listed under "Contact".


For privacy reasons, we will not discuss abuse reports in public channels.

Privacy

ACC will do its best to respect individual privacy, but please remember that nothing on the internet is really private and consider anything you say saved forever. Mastodon is not a secure channel for sensitive communication. 
Staff may examine user accounts hosted on the association's equipment if they suspect activity that conflicts with the association's rules.

Federation

mastodon.acc.sunet.se federates freely with all other Mastodon and GNU social instances in the network. Federation is a network service and suspension of federation with another server will only be implemented as a last resort in cases of technical difficulties or hostile or malicious activity. If we need to suspend federation with another instance, it will be noted here.

Currently not federating with: none

In some cases, it's necessary to "silence" another instance; this is usually due to local legal restrictions on content allowed on those instances. You will still be able to communicate with users on that instance, but their posts will not appear in the public timelines on mastodon.acc.umu.se. Please exercise discretion when boosting posts from these instances.

Currently silenced:


pawoo.net (no media)







Last updated: 2017-05-15
instances.name: mastodon.acc.sunet.se

instances.info:
A generalist Mastodon instance hosted in France.




Our guidelines are currently being written ; but basically:



don't be a dick,
no advertising, harassment, spam,
no abuse on the API by local users (bots, ...),
Any thing illegal under the French law will be removed and reported to the competent authorities.



Informations and status about the instance is posted to @admin.

Currently the only human administrating this instance is @href. Other administrators may be added in the future, as I (href) prefer focusing on managing the servers and the underlying infrastructure than people.




Don't hesitate to ping either @href or @admin to talk about the instance, create an issue at hrefhref/mastodon on GitHub, or privately at admin (at) soc.ialis.me.


The instance itself is hosted on servers at Online.net and Scaleway.com, in Paris, France. The database and files are frequently replicated on a couple of servers, and externally backuped.



The servers are run by an organization (with no legal grounds; entierly privately owned)  called random.sh / random labs; which hosts other services such as irc.random.sh, a ChatSpike.net IRC Server, Etherpad.fr, and much more. I also intend to one day make it my own company for some products, but I'll then separate the business with theses community services (the business will just be a sponsor, and without any advertisement, tracking, or anything else evil).





soc.ialis.me logo and derivations (not found and errors)
by @Famine, license CC BY-NC-SA.
The bird escaped, don't worry. Mastodons aren't that good at aiming.





Background image Sunset Landscape Rocks Silhouettes by skeeze, licensed under CC0 Public Domain.

infos.fullDescription: We're an inclusive community that welcomes all, as long as you're kind and respectful to others. We aim to provide an environment where you feel comfortable enough to participate freely and authentically.
infos.shortDescription: Writing Exchange is a small, focused community for poets, writers, bloggers, and anyone else who makes things.

instances.info:
We're an inclusive community that welcomes all, as long as you're kind and respectful to others. We aim to provide an environment where you feel comfortable enough to participate freely and authentically. If you're not interested in that, there are plenty of other great instances you can join.

Guidelines
We'll be more specific in the future, but in general, be good to each other. Enjoy talking to strangers (and friends!) on the internet, and give people the benefit of the doubt.
If problems arise, please use Mastodon's features to Block, Mute, or Report users that are causing problems. If you need more help, contact @matt.

Once you've joined
Introduce yourself! Communities like these work best when they're filled with strangers who talk to each other.

Background
This is an experiment to see if we can create a small, purposeful community among the fediverse, with the eventual goal being a sustainable, community-run instance. If you'd like to help make that happen, get in touch.
instances.name: writing.exchange

infos.fullDescription:
The unifying theme of Freehold.Earth is free speech. We welcome people from all walks of life, even those we don’t particularly like, to have a voice in the world. While the initial round of invites mostly went to folks from the infosec and free speech advocacy communities, registration is open whenever our capacity limitations permit.

However, if you are the sort of person who wants those you deem to be “bad people” or holders of “dangerous opinions” ejected from the community…this is not the place for you. I guarantee that no matter your ideological bent, there will be someone here you deem bad/dangerous.
infos.shortDescription: Freehold.Earth is a free-speech centered community, extremely lightly moderated.

instances.info:
Welcome!

The unifying theme of Freehold.Earth is free speech. We welcome people from all walks of life, even those we don’t particularly like, to have a voice in the world.  While the initial round of invites mostly went to folks from the infosec and free speech advocacy communities, registration is open whenever our capacity limitations permit.

However, if you are the sort of person who wants those you deem to be “bad people” or holders of “dangerous opinions” ejected from the community…this is not the place for you. I guarantee that no matter your ideological bent, there will be someone here you deem bad/dangerous.



What does this mean in terms of user experience?

The admins don’t want to hear about your problems with anyone you haven’t both muted and blocked.  It’s your job to step away from speech that is troubling to you.  We will take action to:


Try to mitigate spam problems.
Try to intervene in harrassment, defined specifically as a user persistently contacting another user who has already muted and blocked them. If you didn’t mute and block, they aren’t harrassing you, though they may be annoying.  Annoying is not on the list of things we care about.
Try to mitigate actual security issues.
Encourage a tolerant and open community where users can control which content they produce and engage with.


Note the use of “try” and “encourage”…there are things we simply do not control, and we will not sacrifice free speech for everyone in an attempt to make our community a safe haven from all the world’s ills. Earth is a chaotic place, and Freehold.Earth will likely be so as well.



What should users know?


A “post” (“tweet” elsewhere) is called a “toot” here. To repeat/amplify a toot is to “boost” that toot.
We favorite things we like, by clicking the star on the toot.
The Local Timeline is all public posts at the moment on Freehold.Earth
The Federated Timeline is every public post from anywhere that is seen by Freehold.Earth – the more remote users followed by our users, the more of a firehose this becomes.




Are there any tips for being loved and followed by many?

Generally, we’re not here to tell you what to do…but in case you were wondering what social conventions are popular, consider the following.  Observing these tips will also help keep other servers from blocking our traffic!


Please use the #NSFW tag for NSFW posts…this allows other users to filter their view in public places.
Please wrap content likely to annoy some of your audience (politics, rants, etc) in a CW (Content Warning).
Please don’t use an animated GIF for your avatar.
Please place the #bot tag in the profile of any non-human account.
Please be a bit kinder than is really called for, and disengage rather than escalate when you see drama starting.
When someone’s being an asshat, please assume it’s out of misunderstanding rather than malice, until they prove you wrong.




Meet the Freehold.Earth admin team:


HedgeMage …This is my server, but I’m more often active on my personal account, HedgeMage@maly.io than on Freehold.
Consentacles …I’m generally friendly…AFTER coffee has been applied.
KatamariChaos …I like to boost a good toot.




Nodes (instances) currently blocked by Freehold.Earth

**NONE**

A note on bot accounts:

We are currently experimenting with silencing followbot accounts to reduce noise in the Federated Timeline at Freehold.Earth.


Follow bot traffic should not appear in the Federated Timeline, if it does, feel free to report it so we can silence.
Follow bots are NOT under a suspension ban. You can still follow them (and they you) if desired, the traffic just won’t be in the Federated Timeline. Some followbots will not follow users with #nobot in their profile.
It is possible for bots that are not follow bots to get caught up in this ban. If you think you have seen this happening, please contact the admins.


A follow bot is a bot that indiscriminately follows most/all users it comes across, in an attempt to increase federation between small servers and the rest of the Fediverse. Because their follow choices are random (and some spew statistics as often as every twenty minutes), we’re hoping that removing this traffic will make Freehold.Earth’s Federated Timeline more relevant and interesting to our users.

This is currently an experiment and may change at any time.
instances.name: freehold.earth

instances.info:
「でぃぐら丼。」について
「でぃぐら丼。」は個人サークル「Diglateam's Laboratory」が管理する、Mastodonインスタンスです。

新規登録について
主に自分用に立ち上げたインスタンスなので、新規登録は受け付けていません。ごめんなさい！
ただし、「僕と実際にお会いしたことがある」かつ、「何らかの創作・同人活動をしている」方であれば、例外的に受け付ける可能性があります。

詳しくは、Twitterへご連絡ください。

利用規約
日本の法律もしくは（サーバー設置先の）ConoHaの規約上で、問題のある発言や内容でなければ、基本的に許可します。
ただし、スパム行為や上記に反する内容、主義主張を過度に押し付け、他人の言動や行動を制限する、あるいは試みる行為が確認できた場合、内容によっては当インスタンス内アカウントのサスペンドや、最悪の場合インスタンスのブロックを行いますので、ご了承ください。ノー押し付け、レッツ交渉話し合い。

infos.fullDescription:
CMX.IM是长毛象(Mastodon)的一个中文实例。Mastodon是一个开源的、符合GNU Social规范的去中心化社交网络，整个长毛象社区是由无数实例组成的。注册本社区后你不仅可以与本实例内的用户互动，并且可以与来自世界各地的其他实例中的用户无缝连接。 

长毛象中文站主题为社交，科技，编程及生活。发言内容只要没有明显违法内容均不禁止。无论你的兴趣点是什么，我们欢迎友好、热情、乐于分享的朋友。 

如果你不喜欢本站的主题或发言规则，可以从Instance List中选择更适合你的实例。记住，除非你选择实例明确阻隔了其他某个或某些实例，你永远可以和整个Mastodon社区的用户交互。记得到时候 @haisenberg@cmx.im 哦。 

Mastodon的去中心化设计防止了社交数据被少数公司或团体垄断的风险，也大大增加了屏蔽及过滤的难度。如果你有兴趣动手搭建一个实例，请参考Github 官方文档。 

你可以随时备份自己的微博并申请转移到其他实例中而无需担心因为实例运营者的问题导致的数据丢失。如果你有更多关于Mastodon的问题，请参考Github 官方FAQ。 

本站原则上只使用官方Stable代码，所有包括汉化等问题将在Github上提交。有编程经验的朋友不妨加入我们一起来让长毛象更萌，更可爱吧。
infos.theme: General, Anime, Tech, IT, Programming, 中文, 漫画, 技术, 编程
infos.shortDescription:
Mastodon Chinese Community Host

infos.shortDescription:
RedWombat.social is a Mastodon Instance for use by Kevin Sonney, Ursula Vernon, and their friends and family.

Accounts are by invitation only.

instances.info:
Shamelessly borrowed with permission from Kitty.Town
As a user of RedWombat.social, you agree to uphold an environment of respect and empathy for all users.
Any conduct that is deemed oppressive is grounds for removal from RedWombat.social. Any language or action that expresses, reinforces, upholds or sympathizes with any form of systemic social domination is considered oppressive and is grounds for removal at any level deemed appropriate by the Admins.
Pornography, violence, and fast-blinking images/content should not be used as a profile photo and should always be posted with a "NSFW" tag/content warning.


The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in a ban from RedWombat.social:

Unapproved bots (for approval, please contact the Admins)
Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content
Untagged gore and graphic violence
Racism or advocation of racism
Sexism or advocation of sexism
Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in a ban from RedWombat.social:

Sexual depictions of children
Holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
Promoting the oppression of any group based on gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, or nationality.

Any conduct intended to stalk, harass, or intimidate other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions is forbidden and subject to punishment up to and including a ban from RedWombat.social.
This can include, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission.
Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment.
Posting and/or disseminating a person's posts ("toots"), including screen captures or any other content without express permission.
Intentionally posting or disseminating libel, slander, or other disinformation.

This Code of Conduct applies both to content on RedWombat.social and to public spaces when an individual is representing RedWombat.social or its community.


Reports of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be made by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and dealt with as soon as possible. Admins are obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

The Admins reserve the right to revoke any user's content on or access to RedWombat.social, at any time, for any reason.

instances.info:
The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:


  
    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
    
      Excessive advertising
      Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
      Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content
      Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence
    
  

  
    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
    
      Racism or advocation of racism
      Sexism or advocation of sexism
      Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
      Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
    
  

  
    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
    
      Sexual depictions of children
      Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
      Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
    
  

  
    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
    
      Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
      Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
      Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.
    
  


These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

infos.fullDescription:
The instance has multiple goals, the most important of all being making everyone on here feel as safe as possible. Other goals include letting users manage their social life easily and securely, making this instance a nice community with a shared expression space, and making the fediverse better. 

Right now, the only admin and moderator is @wxcafe. This might change in the future, and will be reflected on this page. Please report any content breaking the rules highlighted on this page using the report function. We don't hesitate to moderate posts, to silence and/or suspend users, local or remote, and instances. In France we like to think of this as "Censure Communautariste".


 This server is run on a server paid for by @wxcafe, hosted on Vultr. The server is a 4GB RAM, 2 vCores, 60G disk VPS. It costs $20/months, and is financed using Patreon
The bot @server_status posts information about the status of the server every once in a while, be it graphs about the ressources, number of users and toots, etc...
infos.shortDescription: This is an open mastodon instance for social justice activists, LGBTQIA+ people, and people who are aware of such subjects and care about them.

instances.info:
Goals and Rules 

The instance has multiple goals, the most important of all being making everyone on here feel as safe as possible. Other goals include letting users manage their social life easily and securely, making this instance a nice community with a shared expression space, and making the fediverse better. 


As such, we have a few rules we'd like everyone on the instance to follow :


  Acting in any of the following ways will get you immediately suspended
  
    Posting illegal content is, well, illegal. This server is in France. As such, heinous content, nazi propaganda, underage porn, and all other content that is illegal according to french law is forbidden.
    Posting LGBTQIA+-phobic, whorephobic, sexist, racist, antisemitic, and islamophobic content. You can still discuss such topics, by including a CW, quotes, and a context.
    Making public, by screencapping or copying, private or direct messages that the author didn't want made public
    Taking part in targetted harassment
    Posting spam, advertisment for a commercial product, etc
    Being a techbro or Richard Matthew Stallman
  
  Acting in any of the following ways will get your post deleted and you'll get a warning. After three warnings, you'll be suspended.
  
    Posting pornographic images/videos or nude pictures without marking them NSFW, or posting them on the public timeline
    Being clearly disrespectful towards another user
    Being an asshole
  


Right now, the only admin and moderator is @wxcafe. This might change in the future, and will be reflected on this page. Please report any content breaking the rules highlighted on this page using the report function. We don't hesitate to moderate posts, to silence and/or suspend users, local or remote, and instances. In France we like to think of this as "Censure Communautariste".


Technical Informations

This server is run on a server paid for by @wxcafe, hosted on Vultr. The server is a 4GB RAM, 2 vCores, 60G disk VPS. It costs $20/months, and is financed using Patreon 
 The bot @server_status posts information about the status of the server every once in a while, be it graphs about the ressources, number of users and toots, etc...


 More 

Feel free to contact me for more informations at the email address in the right sidebar, or directly on Mastodon :)

instances.info:
This instance tracks https://github.com/d3vgru/mastodon which is a dev fork of Mastodon so it might not be like totally stable or anything.

I am fairly anti-instance-block. I reserve the right but I'd really rather let users make their own sense of it.

This particular instance should be considered experimental. I am currently tracking Mastodon releases but reserve the right to apply my own changes to the code and deploy them at any time. An example would be if an instance were making undue demands on resources and I found a way to throttle them without blocking.

I want to replace the backend with a pure node API I am writing, then replace the web UI with something a little more my style. ReactJS? I dunno we'll see what's cool in 6 months. VueJS and Quasar. Trying to figure out the best way to let users still load the Mastodon UI if they like it.

If I can get the new UI working, I'd like to add P2P capabilities so these networks can run more like torrent sharing and less like downloading from a server.

infos.shortDescription:
ボーカロイドファンのためのマストドンインスタンスVocalodonです。
Instance for vocaloid users. We are usually talking in Japanese but sometimes in English.

instances.info:
Vocalodon (ボカロ丼、ボカロドン) について
ボカロクラスタが集うMastodonインスタンスです。
ここでいうボカロクラスタとは以下の人たちを指します

ボカロP、絵師、作詞、動画、MMDモデルなどボカロ楽曲や関連作品、データなどを制作している人
ボカロ楽曲を聴いている人、掛けてる人、歌ってみてる人、踊ってみてる人、紹介してる人
ボカロではないが似た技術(UTAUなど)での楽曲制作や音源制作を行っている、または聴いたり歌ったりしている人

その他、ボカロ関連技術に携わっていたり、コスプレや同人活動などでボカロ関連の楽しみを享受している人など
上記に該当すれば、インスタンス内での話題はボカロ関連でなくても構いません。

利用規約

書き込み内容については、日本の法律に従ってください。
Mastodonには年齢確認機能がありません。現時点(2017年4月)では18禁コンテンツの投稿は一律で禁止とします。
問題が発生したら管理人@tomoki(ツイッターでは@tmkw1)までご連絡ください。


運営について(免責事項)

TOMOKI++の個人出資による運営となっております。
Mastodonの負荷がどのくらいかよくわからないため、どの程度のユーザを受け入れられるのかなどはやってみないと今のところはなんとも言えません。見切り発車ですので、重い、入れない、などのケースが出てくることもありえます。ご了承ください。
サーバを強化する等の場合に予告なくメンテナンス休止を行う可能性があります。
このサイト上に書き込まれている内容の真偽、メンテナンスなどによるデータの消失など、このサイト上で発生するいかなるトラブルに関しても、管理者は一切の責任を負いません。
正式な法的手続きを経た場合には、書き込みの内容やユーザ情報などを第三者に開示する場合があります。


※「VOCALOID(ボーカロイド)」ならびに「ボカロ」はヤマハ株式会社の登録商標です。
instances.name: vocalodon.net

インスタンスについて
管理人が個人的に楽しむためのインスタンスです。管理人と趣味・嗜好の似た方が集まって雑談してます。かわいい音楽やテック系ニュース、web開発、サブカル、東京ローカルの話題が多いです。


ルール
・トゥート入力欄の下のボタンで公開設定を変更することができます。基本は公開でいいですが、ローカルタイムラインを一人の発言で埋めるような連続トゥートをする場合は未収載にしてください。
・他のユーザーや他のインスタンスに迷惑をかける行為はやめてください。
・日本の法律は遵守してください。


寄付
寄付してくださるとサーバー維持に充てるお金とやる気が増えてインスタンスの寿命が伸びます。

確認メールが届かない場合はマストドンアカウントにて@moeism@moeism.meにメンションしてください。

instances.info:
mel.social Code of Conduct

As a user of mel.social, you agree to uphold an environment of respect and empathy for all users.

Any conduct that is deemed oppressive is grounds for removal from mel.social. Any language or action that expresses, reinforces, upholds or sympathises with any form of systemic social domination is considered oppressive and is grounds for removal at any level deemed appropriate by the Admin.

Pornography, violence, and fast-blinking images/content should not be used as a profile photo and should always be posted with a "NSFW" tag/content warning.

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in a ban from mel.social:


Unapproved bots (for approval, please contact @ajfisher)
Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content
Untagged gore and graphic violence
Racism or advocation of racism
Sexism or advocation of sexism
Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism


The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in a ban from mel.social:


Sexual depictions of children
Holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
Promoting the oppression of any group based on gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, or nationality.


Any conduct intended to stalk, harass, or intimidate other users, or to impede other users from utilising the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions is forbidden and subject to punishment up to and including a ban from mel.social.

This can include, but is not limited to, the following behaviours:


Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.

Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission.

Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment.

Posting and/or disseminating a person's posts ("toots"), including screen captures or any other content without express permission.

Intentionally posting or disseminating libel, slander, or other disinformation.


This Code of Conduct applies both to content on mel.social and to public spaces when an individual is representing mel.social or its community.

Reports of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behaviour may be made by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and dealt with as soon as possible. Admins are obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

The Admin reserves the right to revoke any user's content on or access to mel.social, at any time, for any reason.

instances.info:
Bienvenue, Welcome on eunivers.social !

Vous êtes sur l'instance Mastodon de l'association eunivers. Nous sommes un groupe de passionnés du monde de l’électronique, des jeux vidéo, du esport et de bien d'autres passions.
Site : eunivers.net | Patreon : eunivers

Si vous avez un problème pour vous inscrire, contactez l'administrateur par mail.

 Règles : 

Les règles suivantes ne représente pas un document légal, et l'interprétation finale incombe à l'administration de eunivers.social; elles sont là pour vous donner un aperçu de nos politiques de modération:


Ne floodez pas
Respectez-vous les uns les autres
Utilisez des étiquettes "NFSW" pour les contenus sensibles.
Utilisez l'avertissement de contenu "CW" pour les spoilers
Respectez la liberté d'expression et d'opinion, signalez avec discernement
Toutes les langues sont autorisées
Amusez-vous


 N'hésitez pas à signaler les utilisateurs ou les toots qui ne respect pas ses règles

 Rules: 

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:


Do not floode
Respect each other
Use NSFW tags for NSFW content
use the content warning for spoilers
Respect freedom of expression and opinion, report with discernment
All languages ​​are allowed
Have fun


 Do not hesitate to report users or tops that do not respect its rules 



Donations

N'hésitez pas à nous aider à maintenir et améliorer l'instance et participer à l'Association eunivers

Don't forget to donate to the main dev, he is the one making the hard work for Mastodon : Gargron

Thank you, Merci, and happy tooting !

instances.info:
Qu'est-ce que le Café des Blogueurs ?

Le Café des blogueurs est une instance Mastodon administrée et modérée par @franckpaul@cafe.des-blogueurs.org et @kozlika@cafe.des-blogueurs.org regroupant une bande de copains.
Les inscriptions ne se font donc que sur invitation. Pour le moment nous ne pensons pas ouvrir l'instance au-delà d'un cercle d'affinités. Copains et copains de copains, quoi.
Si vous pensez que l'un de nos membres a tenu des propos déplacés, insultants ou illégaux vous pouvez le signaler à l'une des deux personnes citées plus haut.

Politique de modération
Certains comptes ou instances peuvent être masqués ou bloqués en fonction des critères suivants :


  Instances dont un grand nombre de membres tiennent des propos racistes, sexistes, homophobes, transphobes ou hostiles à toute autre minorité.
  Instances publiant ou ne modérant pas des contenus non conformes au droit français, notamment les textes relatifs à la protection des mineurs.
  Comptes pratiquant l'insulte et/ou le harcèlement à l'égard des minorités.
  Comptes pratiquant le harcèlement à l'égard d'un des membres du Café des Blogueurs.
  Comptes signalés par au moins trois membres du Café des Blogueurs.
instances.name: cafe.des-blogueurs.org

infos.shortDescription: A small instance for people who use Free Software and are nice to other people.

instances.info:
Privacy is necessary for an open society in the electronic age. Privacy is not secrecy. A private matter is something one doesn't want the whole world to know, but a secret matter is something one doesn't want anybody to know. Privacy is the power to selectively reveal oneself to the world.



If two parties have some sort of dealings, then each has a memory of their interaction. Each party can speak about their own memory of this; how could anyone prevent it? One could pass laws against it, but the freedom of speech, even more than privacy, is fundamental to an open society; we seek not to restrict any speech at all. If many parties speak together in the same forum, each can speak to all the others and aggregate together knowledge about individuals and other parties. The power of electronic communications has enabled such group speech, and it will not go away merely because we might want it to.



Since we desire privacy, we must ensure that each party to a transaction have knowledge only of that which is directly necessary for that transaction. Since any information can be spoken of, we must ensure that we reveal as little as possible. In most cases personal identity is not salient. When I purchase a magazine at a store and hand cash to the clerk, there is no need to know who I am. When I ask my electronic mail provider to send and receive messages, my provider need not know to whom I am speaking or what I am saying or what others are saying to me;  my provider only need know how to get the message there and how much I owe them in fees. When my identity is revealed by the underlying mechanism of the transaction, I have no privacy. I cannot here selectively reveal myself; I must _always_ reveal myself.



Therefore, privacy in an open society requires anonymous transaction systems. Until now, cash has been the primary such system. An anonymous transaction system is not a secret transaction system. An anonymous system empowers individuals to reveal their identity when desired and only when desired; this is the essence of privacy.



Privacy in an open society also requires cryptography. If I say something, I want it heard only by those for whom I intend it. If the content of my speech is available to the world, I have no privacy. To encrypt is to indicate the desire for privacy, and to encrypt with weak cryptography is to indicate not too much desire for privacy. Furthermore, to reveal one's identity with assurance when the default is anonymity requires the cryptographic signature.



We cannot expect governments, corporations, or other large, faceless organizations to grant us privacy out of their beneficence. It is to their advantage to speak of us, and  we should expect that they will speak. To try to prevent their speech is to fight against the realities of information. Information does not just want to be free, it longs to be free. Information expands to fill the available storage space.  Information is Rumor's younger, stronger cousin; Information is fleeter of foot, has more eyes, knows more, and understands less than Rumor.



We must defend our own privacy if we expect to have any. We must come together and create systems which allow anonymous transactions to take place. People have been defending their own privacy for centuries with whispers, darkness, envelopes, closed doors, secret handshakes, and couriers. The technologies of the past did not allow for strong privacy, but electronic technologies do.



We the Cypherpunks are dedicated to building anonymous systems. We are defending our privacy with cryptography, with anonymous mail forwarding systems, with digital signatures, and with electronic money.



Cypherpunks write code. We know that someone has to write software to defend privacy, and since we can't get privacy unless we all do, we're going to write it. We publish our code so that our fellow Cypherpunks may practice and play with it. Our code is free for all to use, worldwide. We don't much care if you don't approve of the software we write. We know that software can't be destroyed and that a widely dispersed system can't be shut down.



Cypherpunks deplore regulations on cryptography, for encryption is fundamentally a private act. The act of encryption, in fact, removes information from the public realm. Even laws against cryptography reach only so far as a nation's border and the arm of its violence. Cryptography will ineluctably spread over the whole globe, and with it the anonymous transactions systems that it makes possible.



For privacy to be widespread it must be part of a social contract. People must come and together deploy these systems for the common good. Privacy only extends so far as the cooperation of one's fellows in society. We the Cypherpunks seek your questions and your concerns and hope we may engage you so that we do not deceive ourselves. We will not, however, be moved out of our course because some may disagree with our goals.



The Cypherpunks are actively engaged in making the networks safer for privacy. Let us proceed together apace.



Onward.



Eric Hughes

<hughes@soda.berkeley.edu>



9 March 1993

infos.fullDescription:
Welcome to your new Mastodon home !

Mastodon.host feels like a small town, but one ultra connected to the world. We have a broad view of the fediverse on our federated timeline, and a small cosy local timeline.

As a general instance, we are not centered on a specific theme, or a specific language. Everyone is welcome as long as they follow the few rules we have. 

We always run the latest stable version of mastodon, providing you a stock experience, with the following modifications:
- 1024 character limit ( not 500 ).
- more search results ( 20 instead of 5 per type of search ).
- text search of status ( not restricted to only searching tags and users ).
- reboost and replies are shown in the timelines ( more complete view for everyone ).
- Your mastodon.host account is also a XMPP account ( Federated Instant Messaging, take a look at google to find a client and use your mastodon.host username and password to configure it ). Woohoo two services in one ! 
- home of federationbot, the one that allows us to have that awesome view of the federation !

We also have a very good view of the federation ( our federated timeline gives you a more broad view of the Mastodon network than a 'normal' instance, there's a lot to read in a lot of languages ).
Although we are a medium+ sized instance, we'd like to keep the feeling that you are at home and safe here. Never hesitate to contact the admin team if you have any questions !

Check us out or check our FAQ at https://mastodon.host/about/more !
infos.shortDescription: A small town with one of the most complete federated timeline. Stable and stock mastodon experience with a few differences, check the desc !

その他公序良俗に反する投稿は禁止します。


■お知らせについて

Babuu内部向けアナウンスは以下のアカウントから行います。
Babuu(@Babuuclub)


■管理者とお問い合わせ先

管理者は@itacchiku(2児の母)です。

問い合わせは、

Babuu(@itacchiku)

Twitter(@itacchiku)

までご連絡ください。

■ちょっとしたQ&A


・登録メールが届かない
登録時の返送メールがとどかない場合、迷惑メールフォルダに振り分けられていることがよくあるようです。ご確認ください。
・ログインしてみたら画面が真っ黒
マストドンは現在IE非対応となっています。IE以外のブラウザでログインするか、スマホアプリをご利用ください。
・外部インスタンスとの接続について
一部のR18系をメインとしたインスタンスとの接続を除き、自由に開放しています。R18または差別的なトゥートの多いインスタンス及びアカウントがあれば、管理人までお知らせください。

Code of Conduct




TL;DR: No bots, no harassment, don't be an asshole.





No Automated Accounts

Don't: If you want to run an automated bot account, there are other instances that will much better suit your needs. We're aiming for a community of people, here, not a community of Markov chains.





Do: Hooking your account here up to whatever site you share your work on - WordPress, Patreon, tumblr, etc. is totally okay! Automated toots linking to your posts are fine, as long as they aren't continually reposting it.





No Parody Accounts

Don't: If you want to make a joke account impersonating someone, there are other instances. This is not the one.





Do: Fictional character accounts are okay, but should be labelled such in their bio.





No Harassment

Don't: Continually tooting at someone who has asked you to stop, continuing a conversation despite the other person trying to bow out, threats, unwanted insults, and hate speech all constitute harassment. Any of these things can (and will!) get you banned.





Do: If you want to trash talk with your friends, that's A-OK.





Be Considerate

Don't: Posting inflammatory content, deliberately refusing to use content warnings or NSFW flags on anything that would reasonably be expected to upset or offend people, continuing offensive behavior even after being requested by an admin or moderator to stop, and generally being a complete asshole is in fact a bannable offense.




Do: Post anything you want - within the legal limitations of the United States of America and your own location of residence - BEHIND an informative content warning or NSFW tag.



Reportable Offenses
This section covers what is permitted in the Federation, and what you can report to have silenced.



No Automated Accounts

I know, I know, this is the same heading. Following bot accounts is perfectly fine, but if you see any bots posting to the Federation, go ahead and report them. The official policy on regular bot accounts is to silence them; follow-bots are suspended with prejudice.


Anything failing the "Be Considerate" rule.
Especially illegal or untagged graphic content. If you're unsure if you should report it, please do. This includes all forms of hate speech and harassment, whether targetted at a person on Toot Planet or not. Accounts with illegal content will be suspended.




Accounts with hate speech or harassment of remote accounts will be silenced. Accounts aiming any of these things at members of Toot Planet will be suspended. If members from a particular instance violate these rules often or severely enough, the instance will be silenced.



Blocked Instances



pawoo.net - silence, no media (legality issues)

shitposter.club - suspend (encourages harassment)

sealion.club - suspend (encourages harassment)

freezepeach.xyz - suspend (encourages harassment)

rainbowdash.net - suspend (encourages harassment)

social.heldscal.la - suspend (encourages harassment)

unsafe.space - suspend (encourages harassment)

infos.fullDescription:
Términos y Condiciones de Uso

Esta herramienta de comunicación está en línea solamente por el esfuerzo de su administrador y, eventualmente, algunas personas que colaboran para que el servicio sea el mejor posible.

Entendemos que para favorecer y promover una buena comunicación y convivencia virtual, es necesario establecer algunos criterios o pautas generales. Si alguno de ellos te parece excesivo o no estás de acuerdo, siempre puedes elegir alguna otra instancia de Mastodon cuyas normas se adapten mejor a tus principios.

En principio, participar en Mastodon.uy implica comprender y estar de acuerdo con las siguientes condiciones:

No está permitido publicar el siguiente contenido (la cuenta será suspendida o eliminada inmediatamente):

    Material que contenga Pornografía infantil / Pedofilia / Gore / Snuff.
    Contenido NSFW (del inglés Not Safe For Work, No Apropiado Para el Trabajo en castellano), que no sea etiquetado debidamente.
    Contenido Racista / Sexista / Homofóbico y cualquier otro que discrimine por cuestiones de género o de elecciones sexuales.
    Contenido Xenofóbico o Nazi.

Advertencia:

Se silenciarán (no aparecerán en la línea temporal pública) las cuentas que publiquen contenido NSFW (no apropiado) sin marcar dichas publicaciones con el botón de "advertencia de contenido". Figurar en la línea temporal pública y federada es un privilegio dado que es un espacio en común con todos los nodos.

En esta instancia de Mastodon tampoco se tolerarán actitudes o acciones de “acoso” a otros usuarios, entendiendo por “acoso”, la persistencia de un usuario por mantener alguna forma de vinculación con otro usuario que haya expresado específicamente no desear hacerlo.

No se tolerará tampoco la publicación de contenido o mensajes destinados a molestar o provocar negativamente a otros usuarios con la finalidad de generar altercados o malentendidos intencionalmente (trollear).

No se admite de ninguna forma la publicación de información personal de un usuario por parte de otro que no haya autorizado expresamente esa publicación.

Este servidor adhiere a los principios del Software Libre y es su espíritu promoverlos. Ser un nodo más de una red descentralizada y federada que respeta al usuario y no invade su privacidad, es parte de nuestro compromiso militante con esos principios.


Características del Servidor

El servidor es un OVZ-5 VPS ubicado en Alemania con las siguientes características:

    5120 MB RAM
    5120 MB BURSTRAM (vSwap)
    250 GB Hardware Raid 10
    10 Gbit/s Uplink (Shared)

Estadísticas en https://mastodon.uy/about/more
