instances.info:
WELCOME TO MASTODON@ACC!

ACC is actively involved in several open source projects and we provide mirrors for Debian, Ubuntu, Gnome and GIMP. We also host servers for the Gimpnet, Freenode, and OFTC IRC networks.

You can read more about our projects and our servers on the ACC website.

Please read over our general usage policy and code of conduct. We hope you'll be happy here, but if you feel it's too strict, there are many other instances to choose from.


General Usage

Accounts on mastodon.acc.umu.se are for personal use only; commercial use is not allowed. If you need Mastodon for your business, why not run your own? :)

We ask that you comply with the rules and usage policy of the Academic Computer Club (ACC):
(in English) (i Svenska)

You may not post (or boost/repost):


material illegal under Swedish laws
material against the rules of SUNET
material in breach of the copyright act
material that may damage ACC's public image or its relations with authorities and other institutions

It's the final decision of ACC to judge what material may damage our public relations and take suitable action, which may include removal of the material and suspension of your account.

Code of Conduct

Please remember you're in a public area and what you say here may reach millions of people, many of whom have backgrounds and values that differ from yours; take a moment before posting and think about ways your message may be misunderstood.

You may not use services hosted by ACC to violate another person's integrity. This includes compiling and posting personal information about another person, posting personal communications from a person without their permission, or sending harassing or abusive messages.

Taking part in online interaction obliges the user to comply with the current rules and conventions for computer and net usage (see: netiquette). On Mastodon, this includes using CW and NSFW functions and choosing an appropriate level of public display for your posts.

If you see content which you believe is in breach of these rules, please report it for review.

Reporting an issue

For technical issues, use the administrator contact information listed under "Contact"

For content or abuse issues:


if you're a user on mastodon.acc.umu.se you can use the "Report Abuse" function on the post you would like to report;
If you're not a user on social.tchncs.de, or you're an administrator of another server who would like to discuss an abuse report you received about one of our users, please use the administrator email listed under "Contact".


For privacy reasons, we will not discuss abuse reports in public channels.

Privacy

ACC will do its best to respect individual privacy, but please remember that nothing on the internet is really private and consider anything you say saved forever. Mastodon is not a secure channel for sensitive communication. 
Staff may examine user accounts hosted on the association's equipment if they suspect activity that conflicts with the association's rules.

Federation

mastodon.acc.umu.se federates freely with all other Mastodon and GNU social instances in the network. Federation is a network service and suspension of federation with another server will only be implemented as a last resort in cases of technical difficulties or hostile or malicious activity. If we need to suspend federation with another instance, it will be noted here.

Currently not federating with: none

In some cases, it's necessary to "silence" another instance; this is usually due to local legal restrictions on content allowed on those instances. You will still be able to communicate with users on that instance, but their posts will not appear in the public timelines on mastodon.acc.umu.se. Please exercise discretion when boosting posts from these instances.

Currently silenced:


pawoo.net (no media)







Last updated: 2017-04-28

instances.info:
Mastodon インスタンス「囲碁囲碁○新米●倶楽部」は株式会社きっずファイブが運営します。



利用規約



１．利用規約の適用 

株式会社きっずファイブ（以下「当社」といいます）は、利用者にソーシャルネットワーキングサービス（以下、「本サービス」といいます）を提供するため、以下に本サービス利用規約（以下、「本規約」といいます）を定め、利用者は、本規約により本サービスを利用するものとします。
 




２．禁止行為
 
利用者は、本サービスの利用にあたり、次のいずれかに該当する行為をしてはならないものとします。なお、禁止行為に該当するかどうは、当社が独自の判断で行うことができるものとし、掲載情報の変更、登録削除を含めた適切な処置をとります。



(1) 他人に迷惑をかけたり不快感を与える行為

(2) 法令又は公序良俗に反する行為

(3) 会員ＩＤやパスワードを不正に使う行為

(4)システムに負担をかける行為

(5)１人で複数のＩＤを持つ行為

(6)１つのＩＤを複数人で利用する行為

(7)無差別に面識のない人を招待する行為

(8) その他、当社が不適当と判断した行為 



３．免責事項
 
利用者は、本サービス内での自らの行為において責任を負うものとします。

当社は、本サービスをいつでも任意の理由で中止することができます。

当社は、本サービスの利用、または利用ができないことによって引き起こされた（直接的、間接的を問わず）損害について、一切責任を負いません。



４．利用者の同意、法的手続き
 
利用者は、本サービス を利用することにより、この利用規約すべての記載内容について、同意されたものとみなされます。またこの利用規約は当社の判断で任意に変更されます。将来引き続きご利用になる場合は、その時点での内容に同意されているとみなされます。



この利用規約の準拠法は日本法とします。また、本サービス またはこの規約に関連して当社と皆様の間で生じた紛争については京都地方裁判所を第一審専属管轄裁判所とします。

infos.fullDescription:
Une instance Mastodon tenue à jour quotidiennement et fournie par Unixcorn. Hébergée à Paris, en France, l'un de ses objectif premier est la transparence mais nous vous invitons à lire l'ensemble des règles d'utilisation. Notre modération est collaborative, n’hésitez surtout pas à rapporter tout contenu problématique !

Notre instance est bien sûr régie par des règles spécifiques. Premièrement aucun sexisme, racisme, homophobie validisme, âgisme, grossophobie ou psychophobie, etc n’est toléré. Tout message de haine est proscrit, les fascistes et leurs copains nazis sont directement bannis. Dans un autre registre, la publication de spam, de contenu pornographique non désigné comme tel avec un “Content Warning” (CW) mènent aussi à une exclusion du serveur. Cette instance Mastodon se veut inclusive et bienveillante, ainsi nous bannirons sans prévenir et sans regret. Les comptes bannis ne sont plus accessibles depuis notre instance, vous ne pouvez plus voir leur contenu ni les suivre.
Nous encourageons nos utilisateur-ice-s à utiliser la fonction de rapport (“Report”) pour nous faire part du contenu et/ou des comptes allant à l’encontre de nos règles. D'ailleurs si celles-ci ne vous conviennent pas, ne râlez pas, trouvez simplement un autre serveur.
Nous essayons aussi de mettre en avant l’aspect activiste de notre démarche. Si vous êtes un-e commercial-e, communiquant-e, travaillant dans le #digital, chez Orange ou la #FrenchTech sachez que vous n’êtes pas le/la bienvenu-e. Pendant que nous y sommes si l’écriture inclusive vous dérange sachez que vous n'êtes qu'à un clic de souris de la sortie.
Notre réseau social, et son réseau entier selon nous, est dédié à la réappropriation des moyens de communication et à la création de communautés meilleures pour le collectif. Les catégories de personnes citées dans le paragraphe précédent n'oeuvrant pas du tout (allant même dans le sens contraire) à la réalisation de ces objectifs, elles sont logiquement pas les bienvenues. Merci de rapporter leur présence si vous les croisez sur notre serveur.

ネタバレなど他のユーザーへの配慮が必要な投稿を行う際は、テキストなら「CW」（Contents Warning：内容についての警告〜表題は指定可能）、画像ならアップロード後に「NSFW」（Not Safe For Work：職場や公共の場所での閲覧には不向き）ボタンをお使いください。

【禁止行為について】
全般的には皆様の良識にお任せしますが、以下の事項については禁止いたします。

日本の法律で禁止されている行為
公序良俗に反する行為

「しんけん!!」とは
【プロローグ】
ある日突如として飛来した隕石群『大天狗』によって甚大なる被害を受けた日本。
飛散した隕石のかけらから生まれた謎の生命体『憑喪』が残った都市を蹂躙、エネルギーと名のつく全てのものを食い荒らし、遂には人々の命にも手をかけ始めた。
憑喪に対して我々はまったくの無力だったが、とある神社に奉納されていた神刀が憑喪に有効だったという報告が反撃の糸口となる。
発掘された古文書から、特殊な鍛えられ方をした刀剣には憑喪に対抗しうる力が宿るのだとわかり、研究の結果、秘伝の鍛刀法の再現に至った。
人類の存亡を賭けよみがえる数々の名刀と、名刀に魅入られし真剣少女達の物語がいま始まる!!

instances.info:
The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of social.csswg.org; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:


	The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
	
		Excessive advertising
		Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
		Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content
		Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence
	
	The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
	
		Racism or advocation of racism
		Sexism or advocation of sexism
		Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
		Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
	
	The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
	
		Sexual depictions of children
		Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
		Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
	
	Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
	
		Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
		Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
		Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.
	


These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.
instances.name: social.csswg.org

• Use NSFW tags for NSFW content 🔞 
• Use content warning for spoilers 
• Any language is allowed 🌎 
• Have fun 🎉

Feel free to block or mute whoever you want.

What's behind ?

This instance is hosted on a VPS at NiHost, in France.

The VPS has the following specifications : 
• 8 virtual cores of Intel Xeon E5-2650v3 
• 16 GB of DDR4 RAM 
• 100 GB of SSD in RAID 5 
• 1 Gb/s unlimited bandwidth 
• Debian 8

This server is backed up everyday on another one.

instances.info:
Code of Conduct

Welcome to Rich.GOP! This Mastodon instance is here you with a friendly environment where you can converse, exchange and discuss ideas, politely debate political subjects, and converse about any other aspects of your lives. Communities are at their best when participants treat each other with respect and courtesy. Therefore, by signing up for an account, you are explicitly agreeing to conduct yourself in a civilized manner when using this instance.

As a user of this instance, you agree to uphold an environment that is radically inclusive with respect for all users of the instance.

As a user of this instance, you commit to making participation in this instance an oppression-free experience for everyone, regardless of level of experience, gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, nationality, or political affiliation.

By creating an account on this instance, you agree to fairly and consistently applying these principles to every aspect of using this instance. users who do not follow or enforce the Code of Conduct may be permanently banned.

Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be reported by contacting @Motoma or by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and investigated and will result in a response that is deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances.
instances.name: rich.gop

あまりこのインスタンスに依存しないように、いつでも別のインスタンスから再出発できるように……そんな心づもりで自由に遊んでください。

インスタンス管理人も素人なので、勉強しながら遊んでみたいと思ってます。ぱお～ん。

But "Tekkadon" is test driving slowly and loosely. Server down or data lose may occur. Suddenly "Tekkadon" may disappear. Please be ready at any time to be able to start again in another Mastodon instance.
Tekkadon administrator is also one of the beginners who want to learn while enjoying Mastodon. 
Let's enjoy with us, Pawooooooooooooooooon!

instances.info:
Basic rules



This instance is intended for engineering professionals wishing to collaborate and keep in touch
Users must use their real names
Discussions about politics and the state of the world are not permitted. If you want that, go to Twitter
Don't be a jerk
Respect others and if you have a disagreement, keep it in direct messages, not in public
Please keep bad memes, sexism, racism or any politically incorrect commentary out of the public timeline
No hate speech will be tolerated
Feel free to use the "unlisted", "private" or "direct" visibility options when talking between friends
Loli, gore and rape is not allowed
Don't make parody accounts and don't spam
No bots are permitted on this instance

If you see any posts or behaviour that breech these rules then please report them (in the Toot Menu) or directly to the administrator @chidgey. All reports will be investigated, and if investigation determines you didn't respect the restrictions, you might get suspended.
NSFW (Not Safe For Work) is allowed if you put it behind both NSFW and CW tags (below the Toot/Message text box).

instances.info:
The following guidelines (thanks mastodon.social) are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.dremtech.fr; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:




The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:


Excessive advertising
Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content
Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence




The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:


Racism or advocation of racism
Sexism or advocation of sexism
Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism




The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

Sexual depictions of children
Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism




Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:


Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.





These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.
instances.name: mastodon.dremtech.fr

instances.info:
Elekk is a Mastodon instance by gamers, for gamers. Games of any type are welcome here - computer games, console games, tabletop games, etc. - as well as game development of any kind. Whether you make games, play games, or some of both, this is the place for you.EXCEPT: the ideologies of Gamergate and the alt-right are unconditionally unwelcome here. This is an actively diverse and feminist space, and GG and the alt-right are a rejection of that. Any harassment or posts that represent GG or the alt-right, in the sole judgment of the administration, will be removed and may result in suspension of your account.GuidelinesThe following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of Elekk.xyz. They are here to provide you with insight into our content moderation policies:
The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline.Excessive advertisingUncurated news bots posting from third-party news sourcesANY pornography and sexually explicit contentUntagged gore and extremely graphic violence
The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service.Racism or advocation of racismSexism or advocation of sexismDiscrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereofXenophobic and/or violent nationalism
The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service.Sexual depictions of childrenContent illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolismConduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism (i.e. the Nazi party)Content illegal in the United States
Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.
These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Elekk non-exclusively uses the Mastodon Blocklist to curate instances allowed to federate here.

instances.info:
Règles de l'instance :

Cette instance est auto-gérée, ce qui veut dire que l'admin ne décide pas du contenu qui peut ou ne peut pas y apparaître.

Seuls les utilisateurs peuvent rendre muet ou bloquer d'autres utilisateurs sur leur compte, aucun blocage complet ne sera fait par l'admin
Tous les signalements (sauf réquisition judiciaire des autorités compétentes) seront donc simplement ignorés.

Nous ne sommes pas hébergeurs ni fournisseur de contenu, nous mettons simplement à disposition une plateforme d'échange et de discussion via un réseau social.

Si ces règles ne vous conviennent pas vous êtes libres de vous inscrire sur une autre instance qui est plus en adéquation avec votre philosophie. Vous en trouverez une liste sur https://instances.mastodon.xyz.

Si vous pensez qu'il faut faire évoluer ces règles je suis ouvert à toute suggestion évidemment.
Merci de privilégier le mail pour tout contact "important" : myckeul@sl-network.fr

instances.info:
使いかた

このサーバでは、トゥート＝ピギィ！、ブースト＝ピギャーッ！です。間違えちゃダメだからね！
毎日3時と4時から数分間、メンテナンスのため、一時的に使えなくなることがあります。必要なことだから...ごめんなさい。
毎月1日の4時から数分間、サーバ再起動のため、一時的に使えなくなることがあります。これも必要なことだから...ごめんなさい。




ルール

日本の法律は守ってください。法律に触れそうだったり、犯罪に関わっていそうだったり、社会のモラルに反するピギィ！をされると...ルビィ、お姉ちゃんに怒られちゃう...。
え、えっちなのとか暴力的なのとか...ピギィ！してもいいけど、ルビィは怖いから、文章にはCW(Contents Warning)を、画像にはNSFW(Not safe for work)を付けてください。もちろん、それでも法律に触れそうなものはピギィ！しちゃダメなんだからね！
インターネットのマナーを守って、みんな仲よく使ってね。言い合いとか、炎上とか...これもお姉ちゃんに怒られちゃう...。




お問い合わせ先
このサーバの影の管理人さんです。なにかあったらここに連絡してね！

メール：fuen.works.999＠gmail.com
Twitter：@NowellGartelt




Special Thanks：
このサーバを建てるのに手伝ってくれたみんなです。ありがとうございます！

instances.info:
このサーバーのルールはjp-mstdn.comサーバーのルールに準じます。

ルール


インターネットは公共の場です。なんでもして良い場ではありません。
他のユーザーを不快にさせるような言動、行動は謹んでください。

また、あまりに目に余るような言動、行動があった場合、アカウント凍結などの処置を行います。
また、このサーバーにおいては日本の法律を適用します。

日本の法律に反するような行為等が見られた場合もアカウント凍結等の措置を行います。
一般に18禁と呼ばれるような文章についてはContent Warningで隠してください。
また、18禁のメディア（画像など）については不適切なコンテンツとしてマークしてください。(NSFWボタンでできます)
フォロ爆、ファボ爆、連投他過度にサーバーに負荷をかける行為は禁止です。
BOTについて

原則BOTを作るときは独自のインスタンスを作成してそこでやってください。
BOTによる自発フォローはしないようにしてください。
悪質だと判断した場合連絡なしに凍結などの処置を行うことがあります。






情報について

Mastodonの仕様により、ユーザー様のトゥート情報等は全て当サーバーに保存されます。これらの情報は以下の場合に第三者に提供することがあります。

警察他国家機関、またはそれに準ずる機関からの要請があったとき

警察等による正式な捜査等による情報公開の必要が生じたときは、当サーバーの情報を提供します。
大学、研究機関等からの学術研究目的での情報提供の要請があったとき
学術研究機関等からの情報提供の要請があった場合は、サーバーの情報を匿名化した状態で提供することがあります。




寄付

このサーバーは私（pinfort）の私費で運営されています。以下のentyのページから寄付をいただけるとうれしいです。より強いサーバーに移行できるかも？

pinfortのenty


一応Amasonのほしいものリストも載せておきますね

ほしいものリスト


寄付を頂いた方々


くにきんさん
カロナロ川さん

instances.info:
Code of Conduct

NOTE: these are initial and subject to change


Anyone is welcome to open an account either as your personal account, or to run a bot. Open as many bot accounts as you like.
If you run a bot here, please be kind to the servers. If the instance starts to bog down, bots that are making lots of API calls will get shut down.
Do not use bots to abuse users. Bots should punch up, not down.



If you have questions or concerns, feel free to contact me at muffinista@mastodon.social, @muffinista on twitter, or by emailing colin at muffinlabs.com

If you're interested in technology, Fosstodon is a great place to start.

instances.info:
利用規約

免責事項

このインスタンスは予告なくメンテナンスを行うことがあります
管理者が継続不能と判断した場合、このインスタンスは予告なく終了することがあります
個人情報の取り扱いには細心の注意を払っていますが、もし何か情報漏洩があった場合はこのインスタンスは責任を取れません
データの取り扱いには細心の注意を払っていますが、もしデータ消失があった場合はこのインスタンスは責任を取れません


発言の共有について
発言データは公開範囲にあわせて接続中のインスタンスに配信および保存されます。ユーザは発言ごとに公開範囲を設定することができます。ユーザは公開範囲に同意したものとします。

ただしマストドンのインスタンスではない外部サービスへの転載はこの限りではありません。mastodon.juggler.jpの管理者は、マストドンのインスタンスではない外部サービスへの転載の可否について一切介入しません。転載を行いたい方は発言者に個別に許諾を取るべきです。無断転載について発言者から転載者にクレームが出た場合、mastodon.juggler.jpの管理者は一切介入しません。

禁止事項

以下の行為を禁止しています。アカウントのSILENCE,SUSPENDやIPアドレスでのBAN、警察や公安へのログ提供を行う場合があります。


なりすまし
サーバに負荷をかける行為、サーバ運営を妨害する行為。
これはアカウント大量作成、無差別フォロー、無差別ブースト、無差別ファボを含みます
その他、日本の法律で禁止されている行為


気になるユーザを通報いただけるのは助かるんですが、通報時に理由を書く欄があるので何か書いてください。管理者はエスパーではありません。説明なしで文脈を理解しきれる訳ではありません。

アカウント削除・停止について
アカウント削除は行えません。削除した後に別の人が同じユーザ名を取得してしまうと、分散方式ではインスタンス間の整合性を維持できません。これは技術的な問題ですので、将来改善される可能性はあります。
かわりにアカウント停止を行えます。これは発言などは削除されますが、アカウントそのものは消えません。後から別の人が同じユーザ名を取得することはできません。

アカウント停止の依頼はメールやTwitterではなく、そのアカウントから管理者にDMで依頼してください。これは本人確認のために必要です。

メールアドレスは本人以外も知ることができる
パスワードはサーバ上に暗号化されて保存されているため、管理者であっても容易には照合できない

…といった理由で、メールだと本人確認が難しいのです。

寄付
entyで寄付を受け付けています。

Ce serveur héberge une instance de Mastodon, réseau social de micro-blogging libre et décentralisé. Vous pouvez vous inscrire ici pour partager avec les autres membres, ainsi que les membres des autres instances, automatiquement. Bienvenue !





Les régles de cette instance


Sont interdits sur cette instance, tout contenue contrevant à la loi française : raciste, sexiste, homophobe, apologie du terrorisme, incitation à la haine raciale ou au suicide, pornographie enfantine, etc...

Certains utilisateurs étant mineurs la pornographie est aussi prohibée. 


Vous avez la possibilité de signaler des comptes ne respectant pas ces règles.

Nous nous réservons le droit de bloquer tout utilisateur ne respectant pas ces règles de base.



Coté technique

Cette instance est hébergée sur une serveur dédié au Canada par la société OVH.



Les spécificités de ce serveur : 



- CPU : 8 x86 64bit Cores

- RAM : 8 GB

- DISK : 1 TB

- Bandwidth : 1 Gbit/s

instances.info:
The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:


  
    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
    
      Excessive advertising
      Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
      Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content
      Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence
    
  

  
    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
    
      Racism or advocation of racism
      Sexism or advocation of sexism
      Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
      Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
    
  

  
    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
    
      Sexual depictions of children
      Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
      Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
    
  

  
    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
    
      Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
      Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
      Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.
    
  


These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

infos.fullDescription:
Witches Town est là pour fournir un endroit accueillant sur Mastodon pour les personnes queers, féministes, anarchistes et compagnie ainsi qu'à leur sympathisant⋅e⋅s. Nous sommes surtout des francophones mais vous êtes bienvenu⋅e⋅s même si vous parlez une autre langue.

Il n'existe pas d'"espace safe", nous évoluons dans le monde réel, nous avons tou·te·s des cicatrices et nous avons tou·te·s blessé quelqu'un. Ce lieu a pour but de réduire le volume du monde extérieur et d'amplifier les voix qui doivent se battre pour être entendues ailleurs. Ce lieu ne sera pas parfait, il ne sera pas toujours ce que l'on voudrait qu'il soit, mais il nous appartiendra et nous le construirons ensemble.

Notez que si vous n'aimez pas les SJW (Social Justice Warriors), les féminazies, les antifascistes, etc vous gagnerez probablement du temps en vous inscrivant ailleurs.

Quelques règles :

- Ne participez pas à du harcèlement, sous quelque forme que ce soit.
- Ne rendez pas publiques des conversations privées ou des DM.
- Les injures raciales, sexistes ou oppressives en général vous vaudront d'être suspendu, même utilisés dans des conversations non-publiques.
- Il est permis de poster du porn ou de la nudité mais uniquement en utilisant la fonction NSFW et en aucun cas sur une timeline publique. Votre compte passerait en mode Silence. (Demandez autour de vous comment faire des posts non-publics)
- Soyez gentil⋅les les un⋅es avec les autres.

---

Witches Town is made to provide a nice place on Mastodon for queer, feminists, anarchists and stuff as well as their sympathizers. We are mostly french-speaking people but you are welcome even if you speak another language.

There is no such thing as a safe space. We exist in the real world and we all carry scars and have caused wounds. This space seeks to turn down the volume of the world outside and amplify the voices that have to fight to be heard elsewhere. This space will not be perfect. It will not always be what we wish it to be , but it will be ours together and we will work on it side by side.

Please take note that if you don't like SJWs, feminazies, antifa or whatever, it might save you some time to go somewhere else.

Some rules:

- Do not engage in harassment of any kind.
- Do not publish private conversations or DMs.
- Racial, sexist and other oppressive slurs will get you suspended, even in non-public conversations.
- You can post porn and nudity, but you must use the nsfw flag and do not post on the public timeline or you will be silenced (ask around how to make unlisted posts)
- Be nice to each other
infos.shortDescription: A nice place on Mastodon for queer, feminists, anarchists and stuff as well as their sympathizers.

instances.info:

In ogni caso, il nostro server è collocato in un datacenter francese, e quindi dobbiamo rispettare le leggi francesi. Chiediamo ai nostri utenti di non postare o boostare materiale illegale nella giurisdizione francese.

Altrimenti, come detto da @tankgrll - voi avete la vostra libertà. Noi possediamo il server.

We are a group of five people passionate about FOSS and self-hosting; and when we heard about Mastodon, well - this is the result.

Probably the first Italian instance.

There are not many rules; if you aren't going to spam, spend your time trolling and/or harassing other people, posting fascist/nazi/racist/mysoginist/homophobe/transphobe shit, or porn and/or NSFW stuff without tagging it as such - AKA, you are not going to be a dick - we'll get along just fine.

In any case, our server is located in a France datacenter, and as such we have to abide by France's laws. We ask our users to not post or boost material that is illegal by French law.

Otherwise, as @tankgrll said - you own your own freedom. We own the server.

instances.info:
Oulipo.social is a lipogrammatic Mastodon for all.

FAQ

  I saw a stray fifth symbol! Can you fix it?

 Look at our list of bugs on GitHub. It's probably known, and you shouldn't toot at @mus about it. If it's not known, add a bug or a PR on GitHub. 

  Can I post links that contain taboo symbols?

Go for it. Validation skips links and it's not a faux pas at all.

  What if I post symbols that look similar to that taboo glyph?

Don't. Mods will discard toots that do this, and if you don't stop, banning may follow. 

  No problm I'll writ lik this.

No. Stop. Don't do this.

  But this is hard?

Practicing will bring you far.

  What synonym should I sub in for [x]?

Try to stop looking for synonyms; if you try to swap out individual words, you'll find it tough going. Pull back and think abstractly about what you want to say and find words for that.


Social Contract
This social contract is an adaptation from Mastodon.social.
What follows is not a law contract, and final ruling is up to administrators of oulipo.social; it should function to clarify our community policy and standards:


  
    Posts similar to any of this will not stay up on our activity list:
    
      Abundant ads
      Bots that post spam
      Pornography without a "CW" or "Tricky Topic" tag
      Horrific or traumatic posts without a "CW" or "Tricky Topic" tag
      That fifth symbol, or any variant of it, that is found in Latin script, including using "3" or homographic symbols in its spot.
    
  

  
    Posts similar to any of this will not stay up on our activity list, and is possibly grounds for banning:
    
      Racism or advocation of racism
      Misogyny or advocation of misogyny
      Discrimination against LGBT minority groups or individuals, or advocation of that
      Jingoism or militant nationalism
    
  

  
    Posts similar to any of this will not stay up and is without doubt grounds for banning:
    
      Child pornography
      Nazism of any kind or any promoting of National Socialism
    
  

  
    Any conduct which could stalk or harass participants or individuals, or stop individuals from participating in this community, or to impact usability and functionality of this community, or to harass anybody, or advocations that accounts do such actions, is not okay, and is grounds for banning any violators. This is activity such as:
    
      Continuing to talk to an individual that has said to stop, a platform's privacy tools notwithstanding.
      Posting, and/or sharing an individual's data or information without that individual's approval (informally known as doxing or dropping dox).
      Inciting accounts to post to an individual in additional discussion if that individual has said it should stop (informally known brigading or dogpiling).
    
  


All this notwithstanding, administrators of oulipo.social can ban any accounts, at any point, for any motivation, if not in violation of law.

infos.fullDescription:
Welcome !
This is an open Mastodon instance, basically.
It's run by the person you see on the right (that's me!) and for now, that's all.
There might be more admins and moderators later if the needs come but alas not yet.

I hope this instance works okay for you, and that you can find a nice and welcoming community here! Feel free to hit me up if you have any questions or requests, be it about this instance, how to make your own instance, or other things not related to Mastodon.

I am actually the only sysadmin of this instance and I can't work full-time on oldbytes.space so, I will do whatever I can in a reasonable time to make it works the best it can.

Rules
This instance has some rules, of course.
First, there are the usual : no sexism, no racism, no hate speech, no LGBTQphobia, no nazis, no spam, no public unflagged porn, etc...
Then, I also believe it's important to remind you that this server was made and is run by a queer activist.
This server thrives to be inclusive, and I will ban without much regret.
People are encouraged to use the report function as they see fit, and can be confident that their complaints will be heard and dealt with in some way. I want everyone to feel safe here, and if that doesn't sound like something you like, you should probably find another server.

There's also a pretty important activism aspect of this instance.
If you're a marketer, a #digital #influencer, or an Orange Website techbro, this is not the place for you. Not only do I feel you should not feel welcome, I intend to make you feel definitely NOT welcome.
This instance, and this entire social network in my opinion, is dedicated to reclaiming social media, decentralizing, and generally creating better and more engaging communities.
The three categories of people I mentioned earlier are not, in my opinion, working towards this goal, pretty much the opposite, and they are not welcome on this server.
Please report them if you see them.
We also block Nazis, techbros and RMS.
infos.shortDescription: Do you like old hardware ? Do you use them ? Perfect you're welcome here !

instances.info:
Jump: Welcome ! - Rules - Specs - Terms




Welcome !
This is an open Mastodon instance, basically.

It's run by the person you see on the right (that's me!) and for now, that's all.

There might be more admins and moderators later if the needs come but alas not yet. 




I hope this instance works okay for you, and that you can find a nice and welcoming community here! Feel free to hit me up if you have any questions or requests, be it about this instance, how to make your own instance, or other things not related to Mastodon. 




I am actually the only sysadmin of this instance and I can't work full-time on oldbytes.space so, I will do whatever I can in a reasonable time to make it works the best it can.




Rules
This instance has some rules, of course.


First, there are the usual : no sexism, no racism, no hate speech, no LGBTQphobia, no nazis, no spam, no public unflagged porn, etc... 

Then, I also believe it's important to remind you that this server was made and is run by a queer activist.

This server thrives to be inclusive, and I will ban without much regret.


People are encouraged to use the report function as they see fit, and can be confident that their complaints will be heard and dealt with in some way. I want everyone to feel safe here, and if that doesn't sound like something you like, you should probably find another server. 



There's also a pretty important activism aspect of this instance. 

If you're a marketer, a #digital #influencer, or an Orange Website techbro, this is not the place for you. Not only do I feel you should not feel welcome, I intend to make you feel definitely NOT welcome.

This instance, and this entire social network in my opinion, is dedicated to reclaiming social media, decentralizing, and generally creating better and more engaging communities. 

The three categories of people I mentioned earlier are not, in my opinion, working towards this goal, pretty much the opposite, and they are not welcome on this server.

Please report them if you see them.

We also block Nazis, techbros and RMS.




Specs
Currently running on Scaleway hardware.

One VC1S with Nginx, Mastodon WEB, Mastodon Sidekiq and Minio as a S3 assets manager endpoint.

One VC1S with PostgreSQL, latest version from PostgreSQL APT repository and Redis.

You can look at the Grafana (Telegraf) graphs metrics HERE.

Backups are taken one time per day using Borg for whole Mastodon checkout, assets (may change in future), postgresql and redis. Plus one backup every three hours for PostgreSQL & Redis.

They are stored in a separate server on a Dedibox.





Terms
The server is hosted in France

The only logs created are the ones from: nginx, mastodon (nodejs, puma web server, sidekiq) and minio (assets).

There is no retention currently in place except the by-default on Debian.

instances.info:
Welcome to the Clacks. I created this instance for my own use, and perhaps my friends if they are interested. I have decided to keep signups open for now, but will close them down if it becomes an issue.

Follow @tithonium for status updates, planned downtimes, upgrade announcements, etc. If this instance gets busy enough, I'll probably create a separate account so you don't have to follow my other nonsense.

Also: I tend to run against the master branch, and update when I remember to. Bugs happen.

Rule Overview

Most of the rules boil down to:

  Don't be a dick
  Don't get me in trouble with the law or my network provider
  Don't embarrass me in front of the other Mastodon admins
  You're literally in my house; Don't give me a reason to kick you out


The Clacks is hosted on a physical server owned by me, @tithonium, located in my office at home, on my own internet connection. When it comes down to it, you are in my home and I decide if you get to be here.

If you cause problems, I will deal with you based on my perception of the severity. This could be anywhere from [telling you to knock it off] up to [deleting your account and everything associated with it, blocking your IPs at the firewall, and reporting you to your ISP and law enforcement].

Please don't make me do the latter. Seriously.

I will try to avoid blocking /entire/ instances, but will do so when necessary. If and when I do start blocking users or instances at a site level, I will try to remember to maintain a list here.

I will also try to remember to announce when I change these rules. But I've also included a revision date down at the bottom.

Finally: I'd love to switch out the default Mastodon images and such for something more thematically appropriate, if any artists would be willing to help out for the pittance I can justify spending on this project.



Some Specific Rules
(lifted from other Mastodon instances)

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of clacks.link; they are here to provide you with an insight into my content moderation policies:

Please report violations of these rules by local users as needed. This site is not responsible for, and has little control over, the actions and content of users of other federated sites. That said, if a non-local user is a problem, please do let us know about that too, so we can decide how we need to handle it.


  
    The following types of accounts are disallowed:
    
      RSS-feed bots not connected to feeds of a Clacks user.
      Commercial/Advertising accounts
      Parody accounts
    
    In addition, accounts that go unverified or unused for a long period will be suspended.
  
  
    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
    
      Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
      Untagged or Excessive advertising
      Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content
      Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence
      Misinformation for a purpose other than to entertain
    
    My rules about NSFW-tagging-required may change in the future, I'm not entirely sold on it.
  
  
    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
    
      Racism or advocation of racism
      Sexism or advocation of sexism
      Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
      Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
    
  
  
    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
    
      Sexual depictions of children
      Nazi symbolism, for purposes other than analysis or commentary
      Confederate symbolism, for purposes other than analysis or commentary
      Content illegal in the state of Washington
    
  
  
    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed in bios and avatars:
    
      Sexual content of any sort
      Violent content of any sort
      Images that flash or change rapidly
    
  
  
    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
    
      Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
      Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
      Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.
    
  

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason.

Last Revision: 2017-05-06

infos.fullDescription:
Infos pratiques :

Les comptes à suivre :

@alex73630 : Administrateur de cette instance
@admin : Essentiellement pour transmettre des informations concernant l'administration (nouveaux modérateurs, MaJ des règles...)
@status : Indique les futurs maintenances, rapport de mise à jour, nouvelles fonctionnalités et bugs temporaires connus
@support : Fourni une assistance aux utilisateurs (préférez contacter/consulter @support@mastodon.social, qui est le compte officiel d'assistance de Mastodon)
Nota : Pour le moment, il est difficile de gérer plusieurs comptes depuis Mastodon, ne vous attendez pas à une réponse rapide sur ces comptes, excepté pour @alex73630
Spécifications du serveur :

Le serveur est actuellement hébergé chez SoYouStart.com en France, dans leur datacenter de Roubaix.

Le modèle : SYS-IP-1S

Règles :

Pas de règles spécifiques, tout ce que je demande c'est le respect de chacun, pas d'insultes, de racisme, d'homophobie, contenu illégaux etc... Bref tout ce qui va du bon sens !

De même, les comptes parodiques/non officiels sont autorisés tant qu'il est indiqué dans la description la mention de compte parodique ou le username officiel de la personne.

Egalement, pour éviter tout incompréhension, merci de ne pas utiliser le ✅ (:white_check_mark:) à coté de votre pseudo pour vous signaler comme étant "verified"/compte actif. D'autres emoji peuvent être utilisé à cet effet.

En cas de non respect de ces règles, je me réserve le droit de suspendre/mute sans préavis.

instances.info:
Infos pratiques :
Les comptes à suivre :

  @alex73630 : Administrateur de cette instance
  @admin : Essentiellement pour transmettre des informations concernant l'administration (nouveaux modérateurs, MaJ des règles...)
  @status : Indique les futurs maintenances, rapport de mise à jour, nouvelles fonctionnalités et bugs temporaires connus
  @support : Fourni une assistance aux utilisateurs (préférez contacter/consulter @support@mastodon.social, qui est le compte officiel d'assistance de Mastodon)


Nota : Pour le moment, il est difficile de gérer plusieurs comptes depuis Mastodon, ne vous attendez pas à une réponse rapide sur ces comptes, excepté pour @alex73630


Spécifications du serveur :

Le serveur est actuellement hébergé chez SoYouStart.com en France, dans leur datacenter de Roubaix.


Le modèle : SYS-IP-1S


Règles :

Pas de règles spécifiques, tout ce que je demande c'est le respect de chacun, pas d'insultes, de racisme, d'homophobie, contenu illégaux etc... Bref tout ce qui va du bon sens !


De même, les comptes parodiques/non officiels sont autorisés tant qu'il est indiqué dans la description la mention de compte parodique ou le username officiel de la personne.


Egalement, pour éviter tout incompréhension, merci de ne pas utiliser le ✅ (:white_check_mark:) à coté de votre pseudo pour vous signaler comme étant "verified"/compte actif. D'autres emoji peuvent être utilisé à cet effet.


En cas de non respect de ces règles, je me réserve le droit de suspendre/mute sans préavis.

instances.info:
やくそく

インスタンスについて

日本に設置されています。日本の法律を守ってください
短時間での大量投稿（バルス）はサーバの負荷になるのでやめてください
無差別ブースト・無差別フォロー・無差別ファボもサーバの負荷になるのでやめてください
ストレージの容量も有限なので大きなファイルは外部サービスを活用してください
メンテナンスのためにサービスが止まることがあります
事故によってデータが消えることがあります
管理者が継続不能と判断した場合このインスタンスは予告なく終了します
やくそくを読んでませんでした、は通用しません


アカウントについて

データのエクスポートを時々してください
警察や裁判所の依頼があった場合情報提供をします
アカウントの停止をしたい場合はDMを送ってください。

アカウントの停止をしてもアカウントが使えなくなるだけで情報は残ります
アカウントの削除は行いません
宣伝系のアカウントは自分でインスタンス立ててください（見つけたらSuspendします）


通報について

必ず第三者から見て正当な理由がある場合のみ通報してください
通報の際はコメント欄に状況を詳しく書いてください
SILENCEかSUSPENDかは管理者が決めます
自分がブロックするだけじゃ済まなさそうな場合は積極的に通報してください


ボットについて

ボットを運用するときは必ずUnlistedで発言させてください
Publicで発言しているボットはSILENCEします


さいごに
みんなへいわにぐだぐだしよう


サーバちゃんについて
FUJITSU PRIMERGY TX1310 M1というサーバです

ますとどん以外にも動かしているものがあるので

処理能力をフル活用することはできないです



CPU: Celeron G1820(2.70GHz)

RAM: 4GB→8GB（すごーい！）


ねこにうむについて
てきとうにアプリを作りました。

起動したらろぐいんボタンを押すとブラウザが起動してますとどんの認証をします。



カメラのマーク：クイックねこにうむ

鉛筆のマーク：ポスト

家のマーク：ホームTL

人のマーク：ローカルTL

写真のマーク：ハッシュタグ「#ねこにうむ」

地球のマーク：連合TL



クイックねこにうむ：写真を撮って「#ねこにうむ」にポスト



横方向にしゅっとやると隣の画面に移動します。

一番上で下に向かってしゅっとやると更新します

ストリーミングAPIが有効になっているのでしゅっとやらなくても勝手に更新されます

クイックねこにうむ機能が下手するとスパム投稿なのでsns.gdgd.jp.netにしかログインできないようになってます。

テストで作ったアプリなので確実に動くかどうかはわからないです。

それでもいいって人はAPKをダウンロードできるようにしたのでどうぞ

→Playストアに登録しました。nekonium

※一応今のAPKは残しておきますが今後はPlayストア版を更新します

ひとこと
ぐだぐだと特にこだわりなく進行します。

ある程度のユーザーを抱えたので速度維持を第一目標とします

Hello everyone! Basic social rules apply here, and the moderation follows up on each report. Every rule violation can end up in an account suspension.

* violence (text and medias)
* stories including *phobias (text and medias)
* sexual content (text and medias)
Please remember to use the NSFW tags for all of the above, are medias are displayed enven with Content Warning on.

instances.info:
Bot Policy


Bots are tentatively allowed on this server as long as they are useful, interesting, or amusing. Bots that post excessively, that simply boost or link other posts, that just follow other users, or that produce badly-formed output will be suspended. Contact the admins if you have a problem. Yes, we know it's vague.


Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct

Our Pledge

In the interest of fostering an open and welcoming environment, we as
contributors and maintainers pledge to making participation in our project and
our community a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of age, body
size, disability, ethnicity, gender identity and expression, level of experience,
nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, or sexual identity and
orientation.

Our Standards

Examples of behavior that contributes to creating a positive environment
include:


  Using welcoming and inclusive language
  Being respectful of differing viewpoints and experiences
  Gracefully accepting constructive criticism
  Focusing on what is best for the community
  Showing empathy towards other community members


Examples of unacceptable behavior by participants include:


  The use of sexualized language or imagery and unwelcome sexual attention or advances
  Trolling, insulting/derogatory comments, and personal or political attacks
  Public or private harassment
  Publishing others' private information, such as a physical or electronic address, without explicit permission
  Other conduct which could reasonably be considered inappropriate in a professional setting


Our Responsibilities

Server maintainers are responsible for clarifying the standards of acceptable
behavior and are expected to take appropriate and fair corrective action in
response to any instances of unacceptable behavior.

Server maintainers have the right and responsibility to remove, edit, or
reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, and other contributions
that are not aligned to this Code of Conduct, or to ban temporarily or
permanently any contributor for other behaviors that they deem inappropriate,
threatening, offensive, or harmful.

Scope

This Code of Conduct applies both within project spaces and in public spaces
when an individual is representing the project or its community. Examples of
representing a project or community include using an official project e-mail
address, posting via an official social media account, or acting as an appointed
representative at an online or offline event. Representation of a project may be
further defined and clarified by project maintainers.

Enforcement

Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be
reported by contacting the maintainer at @floppy. All
complaints will be reviewed and investigated and will result in a response that
is deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances. The project team is
obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.
Further details of specific enforcement policies may be posted separately.

Server maintainers who do not follow or enforce the Code of Conduct in good
faith may face temporary or permanent repercussions as determined by other
members of the project's leadership.

Attribution

This Code of Conduct is adapted from the Contributor Covenant, version 1.4,
available at http://contributor-covenant.org/version/1/4.

instances.info:
Queer Party is a queer-oriented Mastodon instance which generally aligns itself with the policies and goals of other instances such as mastodon.social, awoo.space and icosahedron.website,
 aiming as much as possible to be a safe space for its users. The rules pretty much boil down to "be good to each other", but a few rules I'd like to explicitly list out are as follows:

Any content or postings which may be illegal under French or Scottish law are not permitted.
Any content or postings containing Nazi symbolism, ideology and the promotion thereof, are strictly forbidden and seriously uncool.
Racism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia and any other discriminatory conduct which attacks any individual or group of individuals based on what they are or what they believe in, is strictly forbidden and also seriously uncool.
Any conduct which abuses this Mastodon instance, or which causes harm to other Mastodon instances, and/or the users thereof, is strictly forbidden and seriously uncool.



A status page for this Mastodon instance is available here.


This Mastodon instance generally operates in open federation, but specific domains are blocked if and when identified as being either indifferent to or permissive of abusive conduct. In the interest of full transparency, this list is published below.


Table last updated 18/4/17.

instances.info:
This is an open instance of the Mastodon social network, aimed at gathering the Scottish web/tech/startup scene in one local timeline.

You don't need to be Scottish or in Scotland to be welcome here! If you're interested in the tech scene, or friends with people here, you're more than welcome!

Code of Conduct

This will be fleshed out in more detail at a later date, but the summary is:

Show respect for people's personal space. If they don't want you in their mentions, leave.
Do not use this platform to harass, stalk, troll, spam, or otherwise be a dick.
No nazis.

If you are experiencing harassment or spamming, please report the offending account and I'll investigate. If you feel at risk or otherwise want to contact the admin directly, I can be reached at john@scotland.computer.

The mgmt reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason, except as prohibited by law.

instances.info:
Conditions d'utilisation
Version courte (TL;DR comme on dit chez nous) (version longue)

On est sympathiques :


Votre contenu vous appartient (mais nous vous encourageons à le publier sous licence libre) ;
Framasoft n’exploitera pas vos données personnelles, sauf à fin de statistiques internes (anonymisées) ou pour vous prévenir d’un changement important sur le service ;
Framasoft ne transmettra ni ne revendra vos données personnelles (votre vie privée nous tient - vraiment - à cœur) ;
Les engagements de Framasoft résultent d’une démarche militante inspirée du mouvement de l’éducation populaire, vous pouvez les retrouver dans notre Charte des services Libres, Ethiques, Décentralisés et Solidaires.

Mais il ne faut pas nous prendre pour autant pour des chatons :


« La loi est la loi, et on ne veut pas finir en taule »
Vous devez respecter la loi (que celle-ci soit bien faite ou idiote), sinon votre compte sera supprimé


« Merci d’être poli et respectueux avec ses voisins de service »
Vous devez respecter les autres utilisateurs en faisant preuve de civisme et de politesse, sinon votre contenu, voire votre compte, pourront être supprimés, sans négociation

« Si ça casse, on n’est pas obligé de réparer »
Framasoft propose ce service gratuitement et librement. Si vous perdez des données, par votre faute ou par la nôtre, désolé, mais ça arrive. Nous ferons ce que nous pouvons pour les récupérer, mais nous ne nous assignons aucune obligation de résultat. En clair, évitez de mettre des données sensibles ou importantes sur les services Framasoft, car en cas de perte, nous ne garantissons pas leur récupération

« Si vous n’êtes pas contents, vous êtes invités à aller voir ailleurs »
Si le service ne vous convient pas, libre à vous d’en trouver un équivalent (ou meilleur) ailleurs, ou de monter le vôtre

« Tout abus sera puni »
Si un utilisateur abuse du service, par exemple en monopolisant des ressources machines partagées, ou en publiant des contenus considérés comme non pertinents, son contenu ou son compte pourra être supprimé sans avertissement ni négociation. Framasoft reste seul juge de cette notion « d’abus » dans le but de fournir le meilleur service possible à l’ensemble de ses utilisateurs. Si cela vous parait anti-démocratique, anti-libriste, anti-liberté-d’expression, merci de vous référer à la clause précédente

« Rien n’est éternel »
Les services peuvent fermer (faute de fonds pour les maintenir, par exemple), ils peuvent être victimes d’intrusion (le « 100 % sécurisé » n’existe pas). Nous vous encourageons donc à conserver une copie des données qui vous importent, car Framasoft ne saurait être tenu pour responsable de leur hébergement sans limite de temps

Welcome to the א community!

First, here are the main ideas behind our rules that should be yours:

- The respect of others is primary.
- This instance wants to be peaceful and welcoming.
- Each user is responsible of their account.

Rules of Aleph.land

You can be suspended for:

- Sharing content that is illegal in France (pedophilia, mainly).
- Taking part of a harassment.
- Putting someone in danger.
- Having a racist, sexist, discriminating or oppressive talk.
- Voluntarily degrading the prosperity or the good atmosphere of the instance.

You can be muted from the public timelines for:

- Posting a media, some text or a link to the following contents without an explicit content warning and NSFW cover:
    - nudity (#nude)
    - gore (#gore)
    - pornography (#porn)
    - a flashy media that could be harmful for photosensitive people (#epilepsywarning)
    - spoil (#spoil)
- Unpleasant shitposting or flooding.
- Making abusive ads.
- Posting automatic toots from another source.

Please keep in mind that this rules are here to guarantee a good experience to everyone on the instance. Also, this list is not exhaustive and moderators will do their best to solve problems that may not have been specified here.
If you have any question, or suggestion, don't hesitate to contact me at @Madeorsk@aleph.land! :) 

You can also donate every month to help me to maintain this instance: patreon.com/alephland

instances.info:
インターネットは公共の場です。なんでもして良い場ではありません。
他のユーザーを不快にさせるような言動、行動は謹んでください。

また、あまりに目に余るような言動、行動があった場合、アカウント凍結などの処置を行います。
また、このサーバーにおいては日本の法律を適用します。

日本の法律に反するような行為等が見られた場合もアカウント凍結等の措置を行います。
一般に18禁と呼ばれるような文章についてはContent Warningで隠してください。
また、18禁のメディア（画像など）については不適切なコンテンツとしてマークしてください。(NSFWボタンでできます)
フォロ爆、ファボ爆、連投他過度にサーバーに負荷をかける行為は禁止です。
BOTについて

原則BOTを作るときは独自のインスタンスを作成してそこでやってください。
BOTによる自発フォローはしないようにしてください。
悪質だと判断した場合連絡なしに凍結などの処置を行うことがあります。






情報について

Mastodonの仕様により、ユーザー様のトゥート情報等は全て当サーバーに保存されます。これらの情報は以下の場合に第三者に提供することがあります。

警察他国家機関、またはそれに準ずる機関からの要請があったとき

警察等による正式な捜査等による情報公開の必要が生じたときは、当サーバーの情報を提供します。
大学、研究機関等からの学術研究目的での情報提供の要請があったとき
学術研究機関等からの情報提供の要請があった場合は、サーバーの情報を匿名化した状態で提供することがあります。

instances.info:
Cette instance est un endroit de libre-expression.



Comme celle-ci doit malheureusement connaître des limites, il est bon de les énoncer.

Voici ce que je n'admet pas en tant qu'administrateur de l'instance :



-le racisme

-le sexisme

-la LGBTphobie

-l'humiliation

-l'appel à la haine

-le harcèlement

-la volonté de nuire à l'autre

-la pédopornographie



Ça n'est pas exhaustif ni figé, mais c'est pour bien comprendre les valeurs en jeu ici.

La personne qui fait ça, de manière non équivoque, c'est un ban direct.



Pour le reste, vous pouvez poster du porn, de la religion ou du steak tartare, en CW ou pas, je m'en balance.

Ce sont vos valeurs morales, elles ne concernent que vous et vos interlocuteurs, s'ils veulent vous bloquer, qu'ils le fassent eux-mêmes.
 Si vous voulez vous censurer c'est pareil, je ne le ferai pas à votre place.



Enfin, Mastodon permet de bloquer au niveau de l'instance même, des utilisateurs d'autres instances, voire une instance entière.

Ce pouvoir est particulièrement lourd, voici donc la liste exhaustive des blocages en cours de manière globale à l'instance :


- utilisateur : @jpney@masto.themimitoof.fr

- instance : https://pawoo.net/ (silence + no media caching : les toots ne s'afficheront pas dans la federated timeline, mais vous pouvez suivre des utilisateurs de cette instance)



Ce service est hébergé en Allemagne, les règles s'appliquant en termes de contenu et de gestion des données privées sont donc celles de ce pays.

infos.fullDescription: A mastodon instance for science and scholarship discussion. Powered by Huma-Num, the french infrastructure for SSH and digital humanities.
infos.shortDescription: A mastodon instance for science and scholarship discussion.

instances.info:
A propos de cette instance
Instance mastodon dédiée à l'enseignement supérieur et à la recherche. Elle se veut interdisciplinaire et ouverte à tous. Elle est mise en oeuvre et maintenue par la TGIR Huma-Num.
Nous vous demandons de rester courtois et polis dans vos échanges. De plus, les contenus suivant sont strictement interdit : Raciste, sexiste, homophobe, apologie du terrorisme, incitation à la haine raciale ou au suicide, pornographie, etc. Nous nous réservons le droit de bloquer tout utilisateur ne respectant pas ces règles de base.

Huma-Num est une très grande infrastructure de recherche (TGIR) visant à faciliter le tournant numérique de la recherche en sciences humaines et sociales. Pour remplir cette mission, elle est bâtie sur une organisation originale consistant à mettre en œuvre un dispositif humain (concertation collective) et technologique (services numériques) à l’échelle nationale et européenne en s’appuyant sur un important réseau de partenaires et d’opérateurs.
La TGIR Huma-Num favorise ainsi, par l’intermédiaire de consortiums regroupant des acteurs des communautés scientifiques, la coordination de la production raisonnée et collective de corpus de sources (recommandations scientifiques, bonnes pratiques technologiques). Elle développe également un dispositif technologique unique permettant le traitement, la conservation, l'accès et l'interopérabilité des données de la recherche. Ce dispositif est composé de services dédiés, d'une plateforme d'accès unifié (ISIDORE) et d'une procédure d'archivage des données à long terme.

La TGIR Huma-Num propose en outre des guides de bonnes pratiques technologiques généralistes à destination des chercheurs. Elle peut mener ponctuellement des actions d'expertise et de formation. Elle porte la participation de la France dans le projet DARIAH en coordonnant les contributions nationales.

La TGIR Huma-Num est portée par l'Unité Mixte de Services 3598 associant le CNRS, l'Université d'Aix-Marseille et le Campus Condorcet.

Contacts

TGIR Huma-Num - UMS 3598
54 bd Raspail
75006 Paris


Téléphone : +33 (0)1 49 54 21 94

Protection des informations nominatives

Ce site web comporte des informations nominatives concernant notamment les personnels du CNRS et ses partenaires. Conformément à la loi n°78-17 du 6 janvier 1978 modifiée, relative à l'informatique, aux fichiers et aux libertés, vous disposez d'un droit d'accès, de modification, de rectification et de suppression des données vous concernant en ligne sur ce site.
Pour exercer ce droit, vous pouvez vous adresser, par voie postale ou e-mails, au directeur de la TGIR.

Limites de responsabilité
Les informations diffusées sur le site (textes, photos, vidéos, etc..) ont un caractère purement général et informatif et ne sont données qu'à titre indicatif. Malgré tout le soin apporté à sa réalisation et à son exactitude, ce site ne peut pas constituer un document contractuel. La responsabilité de la TGIR Huma-Num ne peut donc, en aucune manière, être engagée quant au contenu des informations figurant sur ce site ou aux conséquences pouvant résulter de leur utilisation ou interprétation. La TGIR Huma-Num ne saurait être tenue pour responsable de tout dommage résultant de l'accès par un internaute au site et/ou de l'utilisation du site, ou de l'impossibilité d'y accéder.

== Contacts ==

Fell free to contact me (through @sena@masto.io or sena@smux.net) for any instance related issue.


== Rules ==

Here are the house rules:
* No harassing other people;
* No posting NSFW content or spoilers without using the Content Warning feature;
* No posting illegal content which can get you or me in trouble (this content will be removed if necessary, you may or may not be banned);
* Parody accounts are permitted (and encouraged!), but it's suggested (not required) that such is stated in the bio.

Just be a good human being™.


== Location and jurisdiction ==

Currently, the infrastructure which supports this instance is hosted in the United States (Kansas City, Missouri), although there are medium term plans to migrate it to some European location.

I am not based on the United States, so I may be more or less free from harassment from US law enforcement. Keep in mind that they should be able to shut the instance down and eavesdrop on communications and data without even warning me.


== Federation ==

For transparency reasons,here's a list of instances we don't federate with:
* we currently don't block any instance


== Donations ==

If you want to help with hosting costs, feel free to donate through:
* Bitcoin: 1ESdVqpycpQoXjdzjnW7Q9GpVr2ehT9mCy;
* PayPal: paypal.me/jsribeiro.

Thanks, and see you around. Have fun!

instances.info:
Welcome! Please feel free to join us here, but if you do know that we ask everyone to keep a few things in mind. The following list is not exhaustive, and will be modified and expanded over time. Look, if you get it and you you're good with it, great. If you don't get it, figure it out - we can help! If you don't want to get it, maybe find somewhere else to hang your hat.


Own Your Weird - This is a space to celebrate our diversity. Be true to yourself and let others do the same.
Share Your Weird - Talk about the weird shit you're into! Talk to other people about the weird shit they're into! Make weird shit together! Post your art! Bots welcome!
Cultivate the Weird - Harassment will not be tolerated, oppressive behavior will not be tolerated, and while failure to recognize the boundaries of others may be met at first with a gentle attempt to educate you, repeated failure will not be tolerated.
Keep A Weirder Earth Weird! - no brands, no marketing, no data-miners. You're here to use it for its social function, not to exploit it for some other purpose.
Banal Bullshit Unwelcome - there's nothing interesting about homophobia, transphobia, racism, sexism or any of the other unexamined default settings some people grow up with. Being a nazi isn't weird, it's shitty and aggressively boring - take it somewhere else. You can feel free to disagree somewhere else where none of us have to hear you. Enforced strictly.


Future updates to these rules will clarify what that means as necessary.
instances.name: a.weirder.earth

instances.info:
Technical Details

kosmos.social is currently hosted on a dedicated server at Hetzner in Germany (renewable energy source, German laws apply). We configure and deploy everything via Chef cookbooks. Your uploads are stored on Amazon S3. Automated backups are run regularly and pushed to S3 as well.

Our fork of the source code is publicly available at https://github.com/67P/mastodon/ (we deploy the kosmos branch). We frequently update the repo and running code with the latest fixes and improvements.

TL;DR We know what we are doing and your data should be safe. However, since this is a free service, we do not guarantee it.

IRC room

If you're into that jazz, you can find us in #kosmos on Freenode. If there's no immediate response to a question, just idle for a while.

The Rules

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of kosmos.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:


  
    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
    
      Excessive advertising
      Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
      Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content
      Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence
    
  

  
    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
    
      Racism or advocation of racism
      Sexism or advocation of sexism
      Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
      Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
    
  

  
    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
    
      Sexual depictions of children
      Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
      Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
    
  

  
    Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
    
      Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
      Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
      Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.
    
  


These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.
instances.name: kosmos.social

infos.fullDescription:
chaos.social - because anarchy is much more fun with friends.
chaos.social is a small Mastodon instance for and by the chaos community. We provide a small community space - be excellent to each other (and read the rules if you're not sure what that means).

Since "Be excellent to each other" is much easier said than done, we have a (non-exhaustive) list of behaviours on our about page that may lead to deletion of toots, and silencing or suspension of accounts, if problems persist.
infos.shortDescription: chaos.social - because anarchy is much more fun with friends. For and by the chaos community.

instances.info:
Since "Be excellent to each other" is much easier said than done, we have a (non-exhaustive) list of behaviours that may lead to deletion of toots, and silencing or suspension of accounts, if problems persist. In particular, we do not tolerate:


Harrassment, stalking, doxxing
Racism, sexism, verbal abuse or advocation thereof
Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
Violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism
Contacting people who made clear they want no contact. Dogpiling/brigading
Untagged sexual content, gore, or advertisement
Untagged, or automated, or excessive advertisement
Bots interacting with users without their explicit requests


Please report behaviour that bothers you. That includes behaviour from other instances - we are very willing stop federating with asshole instances.

You can find further information on our instance in our GitHub repository, which also provides a list of currently blocked or silenced instances, alongside with reasons.

We (@leah and @rixx) are maintaining this instance on our spare time, hardware and nerves. Don't push either of those.
instances.name: chaos.social
